name: Artigo
description: "Artigo" is a daily browser game where your objective is to guess the subject of a random obfuscated Wikipedia article. Guess words to reveal all of their occurrences in the text. Figure out the article title to win.

name: Father: The Truth
description:
You just woke up on a dark rainy evening, your parents have gone out for dinner and you're home alone.

But is that the truth? What has happened in this house while you were asleep? What are the secrets that lay hidden within this house?

Find out in this short, retro horror game inspired by video games from 90's combined with semi realistic lighting, a dark moody atmosphere and plenty of tension evoking moments!

name: Scheme!!! Spica, Chinatsu, and Haruka's Enchanting, Marvelous, and Quite Frankly Elaborate Quest to Save Their Cute Girlfriend!
description: You don't have to play the first game to understand this one, but it's definitely highly recommended that you do! Although let's be real, why wouldn't you want to spend more time with these ladies?

name: Tender Feelings Like Water
description:
A yuri Eastern fantasy visual novel created for NaNoRenO 2020.

A water spirit sees a girl in red out on rainy days. The spirit and girl meet and meet again, slowly beginning to fall in love. Yet the rain fails to end. It is flood season, and the people beseech the local god to stop.

name: I Found a New Friend
description:
You've had a long day. All you want to do is climb into bed. But why is your pillow quivering like that?

I Found a New Friend is a short text adventure in the style of the old Infocom games. It is based loosely on the They Might Be Giants song of the same name.

name: In the Hollow of the Valley
description: An interactive narrative work that retells the origin story of salesforce.com as a point-and-click misadventure.

name: IRL: The Game
description: Wander through a surreal digital landscape, meet exciting internet personalities and help them to reconcile how their digital lives intersect with their personal lives. How you respond to their posts influences the choices that these characters will make.

name: Oversomnia
description: Oversomnia is a small Yume Nikki Fangame starring a boy named Irving. He's part of a club that discusses dreams in their free time. They've become aware that they all seem to share the same locations in their dreams.

name: Expiate
description:
Expiate follows the dreams of Corbin, who accesses his subconscious by dozing off to the static sound and visuals of his television screen. It gets predictably surreal from there. You can choose to lead him to the darkest pits of his mind... or just break a bunch of stuff with a metal baseball bat. Either way, something or someone's gonna get beaten up.

Expiate is a mostly traditional Yume Nikki fangame, with some slight alterations to the formula. Effects are a part of the game, but collecting them is not your main focus. Instead, use effects and explore to look for strange objects located around the dreamworld. Gather these items in order to progress.

name: Gnomedrome
description: Yelka Dead, a little lass with big aspirations, goes on an adventure through her dreams.

name: Just Another Day
description: A minimal exploration of a possibly mundane day. A small interactive fiction game for the No-Brainer IF Jam.

name: Kaleidoscope
description: You are Lucas: a runaway teen in New York City’s Union Square, trying to make it to the hospital— with a dead phone and no money —before your father dies from cancer. This is a story about losing the fear to ask others for help, and the dangers of going it alone.

name: Karlson Run
description: Run through roads, rooftops, and prisons to reach that sweet milk at the end. But beware, dozens of robots, yellow dudes, and red bois want to stop you.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Corruption: Reimagined!
description: Funkin' Corruption: Reimagined is based off of Phantom Fear's corruption, but with an entirely twisted storyline and new songs!

name: Purgatory Dungeoneer
description: A roguelite RPG about plundering a psychic hellmaw for personal closure, and the resources to build a town beyond the grave. Become the mayor of a supernatural medieval village. Recruit over 400 former adventurers to plunder the hellmaw for resources, and unlock the buried memories of your companions. Use these resources to improve the village, and the capabilities of your citizens. And strive to keep a personal touch as the village grows beyond your expectations.

name: Stardust Arena
description: Stardust Arena is a fast paced, chaotic and difficult arcade shooter set in the distant future. An asteroid mining unit finds themself in an intergalactic battle arena, most likely against their will. The only way out is to fight to the death for the entertainment of the local supercluster!

name: Astral Ascension
description: A choice heavy, sci-fi visual novel set in space! With hundreds of decisions leading to branching paths, a uniquely personalized story will unfold.

name: Kami-sama Hajimemashita: Doki-doki Ayakashi Love
description: Kami-sama Hajimemashita ~Dokidoki Ayakashi Love~ is a mobile game based on the anime Kamisama Kiss.

name: Marmalade Boy
description: Marmalade Boy is a dating simulation video game based on the anime adaptation of Marmalade Boy.

name: 10 AM Funkin'
description: A christmas gift from Studio Shitballs, based on a scene from Elf starring Will Ferrel

name: Line Play
description: Be the best you! Make your own unique avatar and meet friends from around the world!

name: Kaitou Apricot
description: Kaitou Apricot is a visual novel by Takuyo.

name: Dakar Desert Rally
description: Dakar Desert Rally is the biggest and most epic off-road rally racing adventure ever developed. Experience the speed and excitement of the largest rally race on the planet, featuring a wide variety of licensed vehicles from the world’s top makers, including motorcycles, cars, trucks, quads and SSVs.

name: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou Portable
description: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou Portable is an otome game, developed by Design Factory and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2011. It is a port of Clock Zero for the PSP.

name: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - ExTime
description: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - ExTime is a port of Clock Zero for PlayStation Vita, it adds new scenarios, new CGs and one extra character route.

name: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - Devote
description: Clock Zero: Shuuen no Ichibyou - Devote is a port of Clock Zero for Nintendo Switch. It adds new content set in the time the characters attend middle school.

name: Another Generic Space Shooter
description: It's anything but...

name: Nightmare Harem
description: Nightmare Harem is a otome game for iOS and Android.

name: Houkagou Colorful Step: Undou-bu!
description: Houkago Colorful * Step: Undoubu! is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee+, which was released in Japan in 2014.

name: Houkagou Colorful Step: Bunka-bu!
description: Houkagou Colorful Step: Bunka-bu! is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee+, which was released in Japan in 2014.

name: Pinky Distortion
description: Pinky Distortion is a visual novel game for iOS.

name: House of Asterion
description:
"The House is the same size as the world; or rather it is the world"

Asterion (noun)
I. (Mythology) The Minotaur of the Cretan labyrinth.
II. (Anatomy) A point on the exterior of the skull.
III. (Astronomy) A star in the Canes Venatici.

name: Uyuriih's Perscription
description: Sin descripción

name: Amanda the Adventurer
description: Digging through your attic you found a box set of an old children's TV show, Amanda the Adventurer, starring a brave girl named Amanda and a cowardly sheep named Wooly. You don't recall any specific episodes or characters in the show. Or what happens in the show exactly. Or much about it at all come to think about it, but it still feels strangely familiar. Curiosity takes hold and you decide to watch the tapes and let horror nostalgia take you back to a simpler age.

name: Vertical Kingdom
description: Vertical Kingdom is a roguelite that mixes cities and cards. Due to the fact that there is not much space, you have to build vertically, with the help of platforms and other constructions. You will go on expeditions to obtain resources that will help you improve your camp for your next trips.

name: Destiny 2: The Witch Queen - Season of the Haunted
description: Power, depravity, vengeance. The object of Calus’s desire has taken many shapes over the years. His once-opulent ship, now derelict and corrupted, has returned to our galaxy—its sights set on the Pyramid ship lying dormant on the Moon.

name: Lore Distance Relationship
description: Follow user StaircaseHaven14 on a Neopets-esque site called Ruffians as she faces life's challenges, RPs with her long-distance BFF (or more than BFF?) Bee, and encounters familial hardship, from age 8 to 18.

name: Megami Quest 2
description: An incremental RPG where you play as Megami, adventuring your way though a Norse mythology inspired world.

name: Mailbag for a Tattered Nation
description: An interactive poem.

name: Sousaku Alice to Ouji-sama!
description: Sousaku Alice to Ouji-sama! is a visual novel for the 3DS.

name: For Symphony: With All One's Heart
description: For Symphony: With All One's Heart is a visual novel for PlayStation 2, Dreamcast, and PC.

name: Kobayashi ga Kawai Sugite Tsurai!! Game Demo Kyun Moe Max ga Tomaranai
description: Kobayashi ga Kawai Sugite Tsurai!! Game demo Kyun Moe Max ga Tomaranai~ is a game based off the anime.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Vs 7 Grand Dad
description: Sin descripción

name: Seishun Hajimemashita!
description: Seishun Hajimemashita! is a visual novel for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Hornets
description: A short horror story about insects, endings, gods, and the destructive capacity of hieroglyphs.

name: The Lizartian
description: The Lizartian is a top-down action-adventure game. We will embody a lizard tamer, a Lizartian, who will have to travel the vast lands of Dekoto to fulfill his revenge. Along the way, he'll face dangers like savage bandits, rugged terrain, and the legendary sandstorm.

name: Chaste Tris
description: Chaste Tris is my first complete video game I have made. It is obviously based on similar other games but easier because there is no gravity. Blocks can be freely moved up, down, left, and right with the arrow keys. They can be rotated with X or Y keys and can also be held for later use with C.

name: Vintage Records from Hell
description: Ever dream of running your own Heavy Metal Record Store? How about having the most amazing Vintage Vinyl collection? If so, dear metalhead, this game was made just for you.

name: Unoffensible
description: A VR only sci-fi RTS towerdefence game where you are outnumbered, but overpowered. Towering over the battlefield you will physically interact with everything in the game for an intuitive experience.

name: Soul Night
description: The main character is a kula who masterfully scatters his enemies - ninjas to the right and left.

name: Quantum Tripper
description: Identification with something absolute and manifest as pure observation. Seeing things differently is a feature of our perceptual systems. Removed from the materialist plane of existence and world substantiation. Regions of the brain will find particular sets of images more challenging.

name: Cyber Sweep
description: Mines are randomly distributed. Find where they are by removing blocks. Beacons will guide you by showing how many adjacent Mines there are, if any. You win when all Mines have either been surrounded or have been removed. Be careful not hit a Mine!

name: Twilight Bride: Vormslegend
description: An accident, Philip met the "bride" Alice. Although Alice looks no different from ordinary people, she has long been a person in the world. With the deepening of their communication, simple Alice fell in love with this brave and kind boy Philip.... But Philip had an engagement with Sophia....

name: Merge Beasts: Defense Game
description: The evil Beasts are attacking our temple, and we need your help! Merge the Beasts by dragging them on top of each other to build up your defenses. Fight off waves of evil Beasts and take down bosses to unlock new levels.

name: Wanba Warriors: Character Pack 5
description: This pack includes 4 new playable characters. They are: Water Monkey Sea ​Anemone Erkui Grass

name: Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl: Jenny
description: Buy the Jenny Pack to unlock the state-of-the-art protagonist from My Life as a Teenage Robot. Available Now. Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl game required; sold separately.

name: Keep it Cool, Man
description: Keep it Cool, Man fuses the funky style with typing arcade-shooter gameplay. Add to it a mix of a stereotypical American movie like Independence Day as story and there you have it... man.

name: My Master's A Moron
description: "My Master's A Moron" is a 2D turn-based, tile-based roguelike & roguelite dungeon crawler. Explore your way through your Master's basement (that he happens to rent out to monsters) and discover a multitude of enemies, items, spells, armor, upgrades, and more.

name: Shadow Angel
description: This game is a domestic third person RPG action soul game with female protagonists. In the process of fighting against the dark forces, you will continue to become stronger. Use multiple skills flexibly to defeat the enemy in bloody battle.

name: Space Penguins
description: Work with penguin chicks who mimick your actions to guide the minecart to the rocket! An action brain teaser where you solve gimmicks and aim to reach the goal within specific limits!

name: Delete Virus;
description: Let's become a computer vaccine 'CCAV' to fight computer viruses and aim for A+! Rhythm action game DELETE VIRUS; for passing the virus practical test.

name: Just A Humble Swordsmith
description: Craft swords from a variety of styles and materials in order to best equip the adventurers who come into your sword smithing shop. Strategize and watch the adventurers fight their way through a dungeon full of monsters in this idle battler!

name: Blink God
description: You must climb to the top of the world using a unique teleport called Blink. so... do you like bungee jumping?

name: Lock & Key: A Magical Girl Mystery
description: Lock and Key: A Magical Girl Mystery is a romantic thriller starring a married couple of former Magical Girls. Along with and old friend and a new protégé, they'll undertake one last journey to free Chicago from the terrifying grip of a mysterious serial killer.

name: Manny Boxing VR
description: Realistic physics, immersive sound, and fluid animation make you feel like you’re really in the Boxing ring. With physics designed to be as real as ever achieved in a Boxing simulator, you will forget you are in VR environment. Enjoy boxing with world-renowned boxing star, Manny Pacquiao!

name: Gas Station Simulator: Shady Deals
description: The uncle is back! And he has a new business on his mind… Build new things on your gas station and make some shady deals!

name: Resistance 204X
description: Fight against other players locally or cross-play online on this fast-paced footsies-based 2D fighting game. Block! Poke! Jump! Grab! Hit & Confirm at the right moment. Make combos and special attacks without bleeding your thumb. Run and reach the end of the stage to win the match. Rollback Netcode.

name: Carter Story
description: Carter's Story is a RogueLike game with random elements combined with action adventures, where you try to randomly pick up equipment and fight enemies, and eventually get the trial of growth.

name: Cosmic Ball Tournament
description: Cosmic Ball Tournament is a single-player, first-person platforming arcade game where your objective is to quickly get through stages whilst accumulating a high score. Use speed and precision to progress and become the Cosmic Ball Champion!

name: The Sword and Peachblossom
description: This is a country strange theme of short visual novel. The game has part of the text of classical Chinese. This game is purely fictional and has nothing to do with real history.

name: Hentai Big Tits
description: Hentai Big Tits - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Kisekimura: ZumiIwa
description: This DLC adds Skjema, new missions and gems to the world of Kisekimura.

name: Chronicle of Forgotten Times: Pawn of the Gods
description: The kingdom of Ayderia is going through terrible times, people suffer from hunger and disease, and at this time the feudal lords are at each other’s throats in the struggle for influence and power.

name: Love In a Bottle
description: Ankora the Love Demon only has a month to prove she can live on her own, but the cute single ladies in her area might turn out to be a distraction! Can she settle down and find love?!

name: Home Solo Car Racer
description: It's a small toy car home racing game with 39 indoor levels. You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.

name: Space Molmae
description: There's a lot of time waiting for LOL and DOTA, right? That's when MOLMAE Time!

name: Anime Armpits
description: Anime Armpits... It can't get better than this...

name: Philosophical Jigsaw: The Zen Koans
description: Your daily dose of philosophy! Assemble puzzles and watch thought-provoking animations based on Zen Buddhism. To meditate and relax.

name: Chicken Fall
description: "Chicken Fall" is a pixel-style horizontal shooting Roguelike game. The game was made by myself alone. In the game, the player controls the protagonist, the chicken boss, and with the help of friends, defeats the bandits in the forest composed of various carnivores.

name: Water Me!
description: Indie 3D puzzle-platform adventure where you play as a water and change states to solve puzzles, find collectibles, create gardens, learn about flower cultures and save the world one plant at a time.

name: Chaotic Loop
description: Reach that gold medal in this colorful platform game! Or just do your best score!

name: Cheese Game
description: Armed with nothing more than a dash and a hunger for survival, fend off the beasts that desire to slice you up and put you on a platter (with bread or crackers as a palette cleanser of course).

name: A Steak Temple Panic
description: Deux agents secrets doivent apprendre à collaborer lors de la mission la plus périlleuse de leur carrière : récupérer un artéfact Aztèque magique caché dans un parc d'attraction appartenant à un multimilliardaire qui fait frémir le monde de par sa terrifiante réputation.

name: SGS Korean War
description: The first intense conflict of the Cold War, this war is very often forgotten, its very rapid and dynamic but unknown aspect obliterated by months of stagnation following the first year of operations in Korea. Can you make it remembered?

name: Arcadia
description: In this highly addictive top-down arcade shoot-em-up from 1982, originally for the ZX Spectrum, defend yourself from wave upon wave of deadly alien combatants using your Ion Thrust Drive and dual Plasma Disruptors.

name: The Otherwilde
description: A gorgeous world of photorealistic natural assets, cute villages, and unexpected NPCs. Explore the open world map, gather herbs, create potions, hunt wild animals, build bases, and farm. Currently Early Access.

name: Slime Dungeon
description: Slime Dungeon is a 2D action-adventure slasher. You are the role of Gubby - a duck-like warrior

name: Lawnmower Game: Mortal Race
description: Lawnmower game saga continues. Try to finish different tracks below the target time

name: Panic Floor!!
description: An extremely unforgiving and constrained precision oriented platformer with fast paced flow!!

name: Shake Ground
description: "Shake Ground" is a classic top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker and the main goal is to defeat all enemies and survive in the battle.

name: Candy Eaters Tournament
description: Candy Eaters Tournament is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: NoWayBack
description: No way out is a cartoon style third person shooting game. You need to play the main character of the game, chicken bro, who is forced to move forward because the 'W' of keyboard is pressed by the headset. Defeat the enemy, get speed and overcome different levels with different mechanisms.

name: AQtion
description: The father of Counter-Strike is AQtion! This fast-paced unexpected prequel is a multiplayer, team-based first person shooter that uses realistic weaponry and locational damage in action movie-like scenarios.

name: Simple Simulation
description: This is a simulated business game in the form of cards

name: MiniTrans
description: MiniTrans is a city building and traffic simulation game. Players independently build main cities and satellite cities, develop metropolitan areas and city clusters, and build various transportation facilities between urban areas to transport commuters to earn taxes.

name: Spellarium 8 Match 3 Puzzle
description: That's not your regular Match3 game! It is a Match3 Puzzle. Part 8 has a new bonus game and a new gameplay you won't see in other Match 3 games.

name: Godland: The Fire Quest
description: Fleeing a war, for absolute power, thinking themselves far from any conflict, the people of the island hope to live in peace... As a village chief, your role will be to protect your people from the catastrophe that is war...

name: Walk to the Woods
description: Ever walk into nature with your friends and just chat? Walk to the Woods captures that feeling by asking deep and thoughtful questions while you stare up at the stars together. Some questions change every time they're asked. Some will make you laugh. Some will make you cry.

name: Tom's Adventure
description: A little but very fun and challenging platform game.

name: Beastly Muscles
description: You are a talented bodybuilder, now you need to become a citizen of a famous bodybuilding capitol. Plan your schedule, watch your stats, take jobs as you like and climb the rankings to become a top bodybuilder.

name: Godsbane Idle
description: Explore a multitude of upgrade paths and a gigantic skilltree with more than 700 nodes to become the incarnation of destruction. Use your destructive potential to challenge the mighty seraphim, rulers of ages past. Face paradigm shifts and a multitude of new features along your gameplay journey.

name: Corgi
description: A fascinating platformer about a space dog - a traveler who ended up on a strange planet, plowing the endless expanses of space.

name: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer
description: Nova Odessa: The Demon Trainer is a monster raising RPG with real-time combat. You feed and train your demons to make them stronger, and then put them to fight other demons. You can then spend your hard earned money buying better equipment and demons.

name: Mario 3: Vokrug Svyeta
description: Mario 3: Around the World is a unlicensed Mario game developed by BMB for the Sega Genesis.

name: Tasokare Hotel
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsumugu Logic
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice's Spiritual Judge
description: It is a exploration adventure game focused on the story and very similar to escape game.

name: Alchemist
description: Darkness is calling enter the world of Alchemist.Five powerful beings amass vast forces to bid for control of the fate of humanity. As one of these rulers, you will battle your opponents in an attempt to determine the fate of this world.

name: Alexander: Heroes of the Conquest
description: Sin descripción

name: Ren's Demons I
description: Did you think this game was only about saving the world from an army of demons? No. This is a game about you. On the surface, it may be a new form of innovative experimental philosophical narrative RPG, but its deeper secrets could make you a god.

name: L'Ange et le Demon
description: A point and click adventure game on Philips CD-i taking place in Mont Saint Michel.

name: Rocket League: Supersonic Fury
description: Expand your Rocket League customization options this August with the Supersonic Fury DLC Pack! What do you get? Two new Battle-Cars, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), five new Paint Types, two new Rocket Boosts, and two new Wheels!

name: Classic Train Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Sachin Saga Cricket Champions
description:
From fans of epic cricket games to fans of Tendulkar, fantasy players can now live cricket as the legendary Master Blaster.
Introducing Top 3D Mobile Cricket Game. Enjoy high-performance graphics and realistic motion-captured animations of criket in this sports game. Relive some of the most iconic moments from criket history in console-quality play. Experience top IPL T20 cricket battles while recreating master strokes of the Cricket God. Featuring multiple modes of play in this sports games - One-days, Tests, IPL T20, domestic, Premier League, World Cup criket– this epic cricket game is all geared up to bring you endless entertainment.

name: SquadBlast
description: In 2041, citizens worldwide take up arms to fight oppressive dictators and corporations to rebuild the crumbling world.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season One
description: Prepare to rise on a new front – Vanguard heats up in the Pacific with a new Battle Pass and new weapons, Operators, maps, and more. Plus, all Vanguard owners get 24 hours of exclusive access to Call of Duty: Warzone Pacific’s new map, Caldera.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Two
description: Ready for a massive free content drop? Join Captain Butcher and Task Force Yeti in discovering the greatest threat to the world: Nebula V. Eradicate or harness this weapon in Warzone, prove your elite skills in Vanguard Multiplayer, or enter all-new areas in the Dark Aether to face a deceptive force in Zombies. Prepare for some heavy weaponry.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Three
description: The third season for Vanguard and Warzone is known as Classified Arms. Learn about prototype weaponry, updated Points of Interest on Caldera, S.O.T.F Harpy, and what Titans will make an impact during Operation Monarch…

name: Chessarama
description: Chessarama is a collection of chess-inspired puzzle and strategy games that use chess pieces and their established move sets, then reimagines their goals and themes. Solve challenges, unlock collectibles, and compete against each other on the leaderboards. Welcome to Chessarama!

name: Tengoku Yoitoko
description: Tengoku Yoitoko is an arcade game where a young man is sent to heaven to fight against various monsters.

name: The Oregon Trail: 40th Anniversary Edition
description: Relive a part of American history and a slice of gaming history at the same time as a classic frontier adventure blazes a new trail on Wii. In the middle of the 19th Century, America is headed West, chasing the promise of a new life. Load up the wagon and set out from Independence, Missouri, making your way to Oregon City on a trail full of adventure. Face the challenges of the wide-open frontier as you battle the elements, hunt and fish to feed your family, and more.

name: Frog Golf
description: Tired of games where they never let you play mini golf as a frog? Not even once? Yeah, we were too.

name: Wandering Sword
description: Wandering Sword is a Wuxia-style pixel RPG. Play as a young man from Liao City in the Outer Lands who is accidentally drawn into a feud between two rival sects. Being in the wrong place at a wrong time results in getting poisoned with the lethal Frozen Toad. However, you are fortunate enough to have Qingxu, Sect Leader of Wudang, come to your aid and save your life. This is your turning point: the moment you decide to become a great warrior and enter the land of the Central Plains.

name: Outdoor Life: Sportman's Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Homebody
description: Homebody is a survival horror puzzle game about a group of friends haunted by memories of the past and hunted by a relentless killer. Move on or die trying.

name: Arcade Blast
description: The Arcade Blast is a Sega Mega Drive console-on-a-chip created by AtGames. The unit is shaped like a Mega Drive controller and has 12 built-in Mega Drive games.

name: Economic War
description: Economic War was The title that shook the management game world when it was released. Cross the tiresome boundaries of political correctness and politeness to experience socio-political reality drenched in bribery and corruption!

name: Dat Boi 2048
description: Do you like memes? are you dank enough to take the Dat Boi challenge?

name: Knight and Mourning
description: Knight And Mourning is a fast-paced, rage-inducing 2D platformer where you are on a mission to find your lost sword. Run, jump, dodge spikes, and suffer.

name: Ore-sama Kingdom: Koi mo Manga mo Debut wo Mezase! Doki-doki Love Lesson
description: Ore-sama Kingdom: Koi mo Manga mo Debut o Mezase! Doki Doki Love Lesson is a visual novel for the Nintendo DS.

name: Marked by King Bs
description: Marked by King Bs is a otome game for iOS and Android.

name: Loved by King Bs
description: A sequel to Marked by King Bs.

name: Sailor Cats
description: Sailor Cats is a clicker game for iOS and Android.

name: Yotsume God
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider-Man 4
description:
Spider-Man 4 is an unreleased Wii game developed by Eurocom. The game was intended to be a tie-in game for the movie Spider-Man 4, however it was cancelled due to the cancellation of the movie.

The game has since been released online in 2020, after a prototype was found on a RVT-H Wii development kit.

name: Moving On
description: It's been over a year since you were last home, and now it's time to finally clear out those last few things, and the memories they bring back.

name: Osu! Octave
description: Osu! Octave is a free and open source rhythm game designed to play Osu! Standard beatmaps, optimized for best performance and playability on PlayStation Vita.

name: Numbertron
description:
Numberton is a puzzle game for one or two players, made for the early Sharp MZ home computers from Japan. The game shares some elements with Tron-like games, but the gameplay mechanics are based on numbers instead. It's easy to learn, but you'll have to plan ahead and be smart to obtain good scores.

The game may also be played as a two player battle puzzler, where the players try to kill each other by fencing each other in.

name: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Onslaught
description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic - Onslaught is the seventh Digital Expansion to Star Wars: The Old Republic.

Onslaught introduces new quest areas in the new Onderon and Mek-Sha areas, as well as a new flashpoint on Corellia, and an operation on the jungle planet of Dxun. Subsequent updates brought a small expansion to the story, a brand new stronghold on the planet Alderaan and a new recurring event for swoop racing called the All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally. Even more was added later with a new annual event; The Feast of Prosperity, a cooking event, a servant droid mini-game, a new flashpoint named "The Spirit of Vengeance" exploring the Mandalorians' story, the main story quest titled "Echoes of Oblivion", and the flashpoint "Secrets of the Enclave".

With a later update, old cutscenes from the base game Star Wars: The Old Republic were also revamped and improved, and new Login Rewards as well as Galactic Seasons were introduced.

name: Path of Tengri
description:
Join Bataar, a dashing young Mongol nomad and his trusty side-kick Burg the eagle as they embark on a journey toward self-discovery!

Battle desert fiends and build up your strength in your search for divine wisdom on the Mongolian plains. Featuring some much-loved JRPG wrestling and some sage life-advice, you're sure to be in for a life-changing adventure.

name: Pico-8 Multicart
description: A compilation of different Roc Studios games made in PICO-8.

name: The Inquisitor
description:
The Inquisitor is a story-driven, dark renaissance, action-adventure mystery game set in an alternate history 1500’s. In this world, Jesus did not die on the cross. Instead, he broke free from his crucifixion and unleashed bloody vengeance on those who did not believe in him. Centuries pass and now an army of zealot Inquisitors brutally enforce the faith of this blood-hungry Church that has taken hold in Europe.

You play as one such Inquisitor in service this The Holy Office - Mordimer Madderdin. Dispatched to the despondent town of Konigstein, you will be tasked with dealing with the various crimes and transgressions of the common folk, all while dealing with an ancient evil that is trying to take root around you.

name: Round Table
description: Round Table is a fun virtual reality action game for everyone! You are a knight of King Arthur's Round Table practicing swordplay. The wizard Merlin has conjured up a training course for you in King Arthur's throne room. Grab a sword and get to it. How many rounds of Merlin's parcour can you do?

name: Dissension
description: Embark on an undercover mission in a medieval kingdom hovering on the brink of a civil war. Become part of a vile conspiracy or choose to act against your orders. Stand by your unlikely allies or ruin them for personal gain. The fate of the divided realm rests in your hands.

name: EpicRecovery
description: A shooter game with endless fun of turning back and forth. The game system is simple, with a short stage lasting less than one minute, in which you aim for a high score until you run out of remaining airplanes.

name: Robber Sam
description: Robber Sam - You have to take on the role of an ordinary man named Sam, who decided to become a robber.

name: Good Luck Have Fun
description: A Platformer that sends you back to the start upon death, and times you while you play. Can you make it to the last island, and through the finish line? Or will the obstacles be to difficult for you to overcome.

name: The Last City
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last City
description: Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies!

name: Holy Shit
description: In this modern Idle Game, it's all about clicking that Shit over and over and collected Points. It is based on Bestsellers and Game Legends such as "Cave Crawler" or "Click to Ten"

name: Charlotte: Dragon Slayer
description: A short, well balanced roguelike RPG that revolves around Norse mythology. Fighting dragons, demons. Customizing characters. Collecting treasures. Discovering strange events.

name: Over City
description: "Over City" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game, jointly developed by independent game producers ying liu and nan yu, and published by heiheigame.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Home Sweet Home 2
description: Family evenings by the fireplace in a cozy atmosphere.

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Misty Peak
description: Ride above the clouds on the lost trail of Graterhorn in this free DLC. Master the new challenges to ride in style in the air elemental customization set. Misty Peak - New adventures await you on the Lonely Mountains.

name: Solitaire Beach Season: A Vacation Time
description: 200 sunny layouts to help take a load off!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 07
description: This DLC gives you access to Season 1 Episode 7: Pulp Friction! After a lazy Saturday spent grounded by his G-Ma Cody resolves to end his quest for Godhood once and for all.

name: Stickman Synthwave Escape
description: Play as stickman, escape the mysterious secret laboratory and collect all the pills! Stickman Synthwave Escape has stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls, fun gameplay and synthwave soundtrack.

name: Until the Night
description: Economic strategy about building a toy factory for Santa Claus. Until the Night is a small economic strategy game that was inspired by Anno and Tropico game series.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Predators in the Mist
description: In September 1943, under the pressure of the Steppe and Voronezh fronts, units of the German AG Kempf were forced to withdraw from Kharkov in a southwestern direction to Poltava and further to the Dnieper. The Soviet command is deploying 1MC to pursue the enemy and continue the offensive...

name: Ultimate Godspeed
description: Ultimate Godspeed is a party racing game. Place items on the track and bring chaos to the race! The goal: Create the shortest way for you or the most pain for your opponents.

name: Crazy Zoo
description: "Crazy Zoo" is a small animal-themed match-3 game. The game is simple and easy to use, suitable for playing for a while in your spare time.

name: The Unseen Fears: Stories Untold - Collector's Edition
description: Can you help people escape their magical prisons in time?

name: Medieval Knight
description: In Medieval Knight you found your own village, manage your dynasty and have to engage in diplomacy with other people, villages and towns.

name: SCP: New Operative
description: SCP: New Operative is a Multiplayer Horror FPS game based on SCP - Containment Breach. Escape and carry your team to victory! Can you survive a containment Breach within the depths of the SCP Foundation?

name: My Destiny
description: My Destiny is a single-player game about a bear cub who follows his mysterious fate,wandering through a cold,but at the same time amazing world.Discover the touching fate of the bear cub and go all the way to the end.

name: Empire of Sin: Expansion 2
description: The second expansion for Empire of Sin includes new game mechanics, missions, and powerful characters that come to visit Chicago. The question is, will you let them stay?

name: Spryward
description: 2.5D superhero beat 'em up platformer that transitions from motion comic panels to levels.

name: Blowfly: DungHole Wanderer
description: This is an NES style platformer game, fly and explore to find pink poo in the map and destroy them, which is the only condition to pass the level. You need to avoid dangerous traps, defeat the alien creature AssMan that invades the earth, and achieve the final victory!

name: Roppongi Hunters
description: Join our protagonists in resolving the mystery behind the disappearing people and unravel the secrets behind it all in this classic turn based JRPG with a twist.

name: Mad Adventures
description: Work together or betray each other! Unlock lobby-wide upgrades. Survive a 4-day expedition to reach the final boss. A Multiplayer 3D Platformer with a sprinkle of Roguelike and Battle Royale!

name: Deliria
description: Deliria is a multiplayer 5v1 horror/social deception game where a player is chosen at random to take on the role of a Hunter. The other remaining Players must work to survive and eventually escape the Hunter.

name: Cubiti Parti
description: Competitive Online Party Game! Master fun minigames in real-time online multiplayer action against your friends!

name: Pistola
description: Kill a lot of enemies on screen with the help of your gun and upgrades. Explore insane builds and try to get into the global ranking!

name: Dissent
description: Dissent is a visual novel with choice-based progression and has a strong narrative focus. We will draw you into the corporate office of Moniker Innovation, where you will uncover mysteries that haunt the halls within. Discover friends, enemies, and uncover the truth behind what Moniker does.

name: Gliderman
description: Gliderman is an open-world flight game where you play as a little glider trying to explore the randomly generated world around you. Pull off stunts and chase your highscore!

name: Pickup One
description: This is an parkour pickup game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.

name: Lock In: Final Cut
description: It doesn't matter why you're here.

name: EasyChemistryLab
description: Are you trying to learn chemical formulas or want to test your chemical knowledge and memory? this game is the right one for you! Get in and play to learn many chemical formulas and it's uses!

name: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest
description: Tales From Hoia Baciu Forest is a first-person adventure game that will contain multiple chapters. Chapter 1 has the story of a village that seems friendly, but every villager has their own dark secrets and the judgment day has come.

name: Sonic R
description:
Originally released for the Sega Saturn, Sonic R is a racing game featuring characters from the Sonic the Hedgehog series.

Sonic and Tails came across an announcement one day about a competition called the "World Grand Prix" to determine the fastest in the world. Sonic initially showed no interest, but upon seeing Dr. Eggman's name among the participants, he decided to join. Knuckles wanted to settle the score with Sonic, Amy had unwavering belief that Sonic would definitely show up, and Eggman secretly prepared a few secret weapons.

Who will claim the glory of the World Grand Prix?

name: Ink World
description: "Ink World" is a 2D platform jumping game with the theme of Chinese classical ink painting. The story tells that the protagonist constantly improves his abilities through battles, thereby eliminating many beasts in ancient Chinese legends.

name: Love of Magic Book 2: The War
description: Love of Magic is an Adult Visual Novel / RPG set in an Arthurian Urban Fantasy world. You've found True Love, you've glimpsed your Destiny. Now it's time to wage the War you were born to fight. Book 2: The War continues the story of the Knights of the Lake from Book 1: The Crown.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Bloodshed Edition
description:
The Bloodshed Edition includes the full game Century: Age of Ashes and extra rewards:
- Sacrificial Stone Dragon
- Bloodshed Armor Set

name: Twin Blades of the Three Kingdoms
description: A retro-style RPG based on the Romance of the Three Kingdoms. From the Yellow Turban Rebellion to the Battle of Red Cliffs, Xu Shu is guided by a special sword. Watch this special what-if scenario unfold!

name: Hexceed: Progressum
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Progressum! Puzzle your way through 100+ brand-new levels!

name: Toonkars Racer
description: Toonkars Racer is Cute and Toon Racing Game, You Can Race These Sweet Toon Cars With Low Poly Designed Graphics! Race in 4 Uniquely Designed Levels, Your Vehicle Can Drift, Keep Control! Can You Win the Race on Desert, Snow, and Volcano Themed Maps? You …

name: Eye-tai: Kompeito-hen
description: The screen looks 3D! I can see it! Do you have "stereoscopic vision"? The way to do it is to look at your hand as if you were looking at the distance. If you are not sure, ask a nearby teacher or adult. When you start the game, the stereoscopic view begi…

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Cats Kitten
description: Sin descripción

name: Water Surfer Bus
description: Sin descripción

name: 4 Colors Classic Multiplayer
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Run
description: Space Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your epic journey through space as a baby Martian.

name: Arcade Archives: Trio the Punch
description: Happy, embarrassing, nostalgic.

name: Ten
description: Ten is a challenging platformer in which you face a relentless gauntlet of ten-second deathtrap rooms in a desperate struggle to escape your fate and uncover the truth!

name: The Jumping Pizza
description:
Join BIG P on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Kruger
description: Sin descripción

name: Accident
description: The course of each accident consists of several stages and possibilities: Providing assistance to accident victims. It is necessary to check the condition of accident victims and help those who need it most. Every accident is different so it is necessary…

name: Opposites
description: Opposites is a Tetris-style competitive puzzle game. Two players play simultaneously on the same field; one player adds white pieces from the left while the other adds black pieces from the right. Solid objects on one side become open space on the other. If a player completes a line of their color, that line vanishes and the field shifts toward the other player. When one player's open space reaches the other player's edge, they win the game. Opposites can be played either against the computer or with a second player.

name: LolShot.io
description:
LOLShot.io is a free multiplayer first-person shooter. It's a web game, no download needed.
Challenge your friends in frantic aerial action, earn points and badges for special combos like yeeting opponents out of the arena, mid-air kills and kill streaks. Rocket-jump around the map, jetpack yourself high in the air with your flamethrower raining destruction from above, heal up by sucking life out of your opponent with the Lifegun. Fully customizable outfits and weapons.

name: Moth-Kubit Grimes
description: Moth-Kubit Grimes is a 2D RPG with complex dialogue and choices. Take on the mantle of an employee that keeps on working even though the reality is about to reset.

name: Tower of the Sorceror
description: Tower of the Sorcerer is a non-linear puzzle game disguised as an RPG.

name: Arcade Portable
description:
The Arcade Portable is a handheld Sega Mega Drive console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It was the second handheld to be produced by AtGames, following the Arcade Gamer Portable, and was bettered by the Arcade Ultimate.

Like many of AtGames' products, the true name for this handheld is not known. AtGames' website calls it the Arcade Portable, but the device was renamed by various distributors. Packaging calls it the Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player. The system was manufactured by AtGames who distributed across Asia. Blaze Europe distributed across Europe and Tectoy brought it to Brazil as the Mega Drive Portátil.

name: Star Wars: The Old Republic - Legacy of the Sith
description:
Star Wars: The Old Republic: Legacy of the Sith is the eighth Digital Expansion to Star Wars: The Old Republic.

Legacy of the Sith takes us back to the planet of Manaan, for a new military campaign with the mission of securing a very important planet for their faction.

With the update, the level cap was raised to 80, a new flashpoint set on the remote planet of Elom was added, as well as a new Operation that players will need to complete.

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player
description: The Blaze Entertainment version of the Arcade Portable handheld, manufactured by AtGames. In this version, Sonic Spinball was added in place of Ristar.

name: Sega Mega Drive Portable Video Game Player: Streets of Rage Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Ultimate
description:
The Arcade Ultimate is a handheld Sega Mega Drive console on a chip created by AtGames. It can be seen as an enhanced version of the Arcade Portable.

Like its predecessors, the name of this product is disputed and varies considerably between regions and distributors. While AtGames call it the Arcade Ultimate on their website, most packaging designs call the system the Gopher, with Sega Mega Drive Arcade Ultimate Portable, Sega Genesis Ultimate Portable Game Player, Sega Genesis Firecore Portable Player, and Sega Mega Drive Firecore Portable Player also in use. In Brazil the system is known as the MD Play.

name: Bee: The Knight
description: Bee: The Knight is a game with the theme of inertia. The player must control the bee carefully so as not to hit the wall. Experiencing that small mistakes lead to big falls, player will have a sense of tension and challenge at every moment.

name: Idol Mahjong Final Romance 4
description: The fourth installment of Idol Mahjong Final Romance series.

name: Banchou Tactics
description: Banchou Tactics is a strategy turn-based role-playing game in the Japanese Gangster High School.

name: Sega Genesis Ultimate Portable Game Player
description: The 80 Games version only includes 40 Mega Drive/Genesis games, however it also has 40 AtGames developed games to bring the total up to the stated 80.

name: Arcade Ultimate Portable
description: The Blaze version changes Ristar for Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball.

name: Arcade Ultimate: Street of Rage - Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Ultimate Portable Video Game Player
description: This version has 18 games instead of the original 20, having some of them replaced by Streets of Rage and Super Street Fighter II: The New Challengers.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: The Arcade Gamer Classic is a Mega Drive "console on a chip" originally produced by AtGames for the Asian market with 10-20 built-in games and distributed in the UK by Blaze Europe and France by H&B. It is similar to the Mega Drive Twin Pads, except it consists of a single pad. The number of built-in games varies between releases.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: The 15 games version of the Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Gamer Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Gamer
description:
The Arcade Gamer, also known as the Poga and as the Master System Portátil in Brazil, is a Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear console on a chip manufactured by AtGames.

The Arcade Gamer has been distributed by several companies under different names and colour schemes, in both 20 and 30 game variants. All share the same plastic shell - a controller (also seen with the Mega Drive Twin Pads) with an extra C button, despite no Master System or Game Gear games ever making use of it. The same shell was used for the Mega Drive-based Arcade Gamer Classic.

name: Arcade Gamer
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Legends: OutRun 2019
description: The Arcade Legends OutRun 2019, known in the US as the Play TV Legends Outrun 2019, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys. It is a consolised version of OutRun 2019.

name: Arcade Legends: Menacer
description:
The Arcade Legends Menacer, also known in the US as the Play TV Legends Menacer, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys. It is a effectively a consolised light-gun with the Menacer 6-in-1 Mega Drive cartridge built-in.

As with prior light guns, the Arcade Legends Menacer only functions correctly on a CRT television.

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis
description: The Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive, known as the Arcade Legends Sega Genesis or Play TV Legends Sega Genesis in North America and the Mega Drive Play TV in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

name: Arcade Archives: Flipull
description:
"FLIPULL" is a puzzle game released by TAITO in 1989.
Match up blocks with the same pattern within the time limit to eliminate them!
Bring the number of blocks on each stage below the clear condition limit to proceed to the next stage.

name: Weddle
description:
Guess the NFL player in as few tries as possible
After each guess, the color of the tiles will change depending on how close your guess was to the player
In any column, green represents a match
In the division column, yellow represents the correct conference but not the correct division
In the height, age, and weight column, yellow represents that the correct number is within 2 (inches, years, numbers) of the player

name: Arcade Legends: Sega Genesis Volume 2
description: The Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive Volume II, known as the Arcade Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 or Play TV Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 in North America and the Mega Drive Play TV 2 in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

name: Arcade Legends Sensible Soccer Plus
description: The Arcade Legends Sensible Soccer Plus is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Radica under license from Sega Toys and Codemasters. It contains the Mega Drive versions of Sensible Soccer, Cannon Fodder and Mega Lo Mania.

name: Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition
description:
The Arcade Legends Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition, known as the Play TV Legends Street Fighter 2 in the US and the Mega Drive Play TV 3 in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.

The system contains Street Fighter II': Special Champion Edition and the Mega Drive version of Ghouls'n Ghosts built-in. It also comes with two controllers.

name: ProcrastiTyper
description: You've forgotten to write your assigned essay...again! Quickly type out something to hand the teacher before she collects them in 1 minute! Type out words relevant to the subject of your essay to increase your grade!

name: Master System Handy
description: The Tectoy Master System Handy is a "console on a chip" Sega Master System clone that was manufactured and distributed by Sega's Brazilian distributor Tectoy in 2004. It has no cartridge slot, instead containing 27 built-in Master System games, 20 of which are packaged within the compilation 20 em 1.

name: Mushroom Heaven
description: Mario suddenly finds himself as an angel in a lovely sky kingdom.

name: Camega
description: The Camega is a handheld device released by H&B. It is a media player, digital camera and handheld video game console, with 15 built-in Sega Mega Drive games.

name: Zone Sega
description:
Zone Sega (or Sega Zone) is a plug-in-and-play video game console first released in 2010. The console is built suspiciously like the Wii, having wireless controllers that look similar to television remotes and that respond to movement. It retails at £50 in the UK.

The Zone Sega is built off a similar console called the "Zone 40" (with 40 games) which in turn was built off the "Zone Wireless Gaming Console" (with 7 games). With the Zone Sega there are 50 built in games, 20 of which are Sega Mega Drive titles, 14 are "arcade games" and 16 are "Interactive Sports games" which make use of the motion control technology.

name: GenMobile
description: The GenMobile is a handheld "console on a chip" manufactured by AtGames and distributed by Hyperkin. It was officially licensed by Sega. Like the Sega Nomad and the Retro Gen, it can play Sega Genesis and Sega Mega Drive cartridges. Unlike both consoles, it features 20 built-in games. It has a built-in 2.4 inch LCD screen but can also be connected to a TV set. It is compatible with cartridges of all regions and ships with a built-in rechargeable battery pack. Its design resembles that of a PlayStation Portable and comes in black and blue.

name: Radio Fall
description:
When someone falls into a late afternoon nap, they will invariably wake to find their mind vacated of the ability to comprehend time.

Short twine game about communication and loneliness.

name: Grab
description:
GRAB is a multiplayer parkour game. You climb, slide and run through levels to make it to the end. But don't fall and don't touch the lava!
It's a fun multiplayer experience to try and finish levels first, showing others how it's done or making levels together to share with the community.

The editor allows one or more players to work on a level at the same time, and any player can jump into play mode to test a section at any time.

name: Doki x Doki Sasete!!
description: Doki x Doki Sasete!! is a visual novel for the Game Boy Color.

name: Miss Detective's Undercover
description:
City's infamous gentleman of the night, Mystic Thief X!
And the detective who was stolen her first kiss!
Among the 3 suspects, who is the Mystic Thief who stole her first kiss?

name: Torikago no Marriage
description: Torikago no Marriage is an otome game released in 2014 for PC.

name: Chuck E. Cheese: Skate Universe
description:
Grab a skateboard and help Chuck E. Cheese shred some sidewalk in Chuck E.’s Skate Universe.

See how far you can skate as Chuck E. attempts to go for the ultimate distance record. The only limit is what you can get away with! Help Chuck E. hop, dodge, and duck obstacles along the way.

Earn points by picking up the Golden Pizzas and other objects.

Plus, you can unlock some sweet gear along the way – insane items like “The Giant Pickle Board” or “The Tongue” – you’ll have to skate them to believe them. See how you rank on the Leaderboards where you can try to beat Chuck E. Cheese super star friends, like Helen Henny and Mr. Munch!

name: Starry Sky: in Summer
description:
The second of the four Starry Sky games starring the characters from the drama CD's of the same name.

Starry Sky takes place at Seigatsu Gakuen, a school which specializes in horoscopes, astronomy and other related topics. The main characters are all based on horoscopes.

Starry Sky Summer features Homare Kanakubo (Taurus), Ryuunosuke Miyaji (Scorpio) and Azusa Kinose (Sagittarius).

name: Starry Sky: in Summer Portable
description: Starry Sky: in Summer Portable is a port of Starry Sky: in Summer for the PlayStation Portable.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution
description: The Legend of Heroes: Ao no Kiseki Evolution is the remake version of the original Ao no Kiseki PSP game. This version of the game features full voice acting, new side quests and mini-games, updated graphics and a new rearranged soundtrack.

name: Starry Sky: in Summer 3D
description: Starry Sky: in Summer 3D is a port of Starry Sky: in Summer for the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Starry Sky: After Summer
description:
Starry Sky: After Summer is a sequel to Starry Sky: In Summer. It was released on PC with ports to PlayStation Portable and PlayStation Vita.

The game opens four years after Yahisa Tsukiko’s graduation from Seigatsu Gakuen. The archery club members went drinking together since Azusa’s currently in Japan. They talked about their unforgettable summer, which was the summer of Tsukiko’s third year. It was their last Inter High and they had a two-weeks training camp before then. The captain, Miyaji Ryuunosuke, announced that he already called a special trainer to help them train: Kanakubo Homare, their ex-captain. The bond between them grows stronger during this two weeks.

name: Starry Sky: After Summer Portable
description: Starry Sky: After Summer Portable is a port of Starry Sky: After Summer for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Rocket League: Revenge of the Battle-Cars
description: Expand your Rocket League customization options in the Revenge of the Battle-Cars DLC Pack! This add-on includes... Two new (but classic) Battle-Cars, Scarab and Zippy, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), three new Paint Types, two new Wheels, two new Rocket Trails, four new Toppers and two new Antennas

name: Starry Sky: Summer Stories
description: Starry Sky: Summer Stories is a bundle of both Starry Sky: In Summer and Starry Sky: After Summer for the PlayStation Vita.

name: 10 Minutes Till Dawn
description: Shoot down an ever growing horde of Lovecraftian monsters. Choose from a variety of upgrades to create unique and game-breaking builds. Unlock a diverse cast of characters and weapons with unique powers.

name: Golden Axe Classics
description: A bundle containing mobile ports of the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive versions of main Golden Axe trilogy.

name: Doom II: Bimmy's Companions - Cordie and Vivian
description:
Call upon strange beings from other worlds to assist you in your battles and even the odds against the Legions of Hell, or whatever monster pack you have loaded!

From the miasma-clouded wilderness of Cliffside, Cordie the Spidergirl is eager to practice her gunslinging skills to take down enemies with deadly precision, equally determined to protect you and also impress you at any cost.
Cordie performs well at range and in close quarters using her Revolvers, Claws, Sticky Web, and flashier techniques such as the Dragon's Breath Winchester, and a fearsome and highly cinematic finisher. Occasionally she'll leave you a little present in a Silk Pouch!

A shadow dances between the poorly lit, run-down streets of Twilight Town. Vivian the Shadow Sprite is here to use her slow but powerful dark magics to obliterate crowds of enemies, and send even the strongest enemies into retreat.
Vivian is a powerful ranged attacker using her Dark Tendril, Fiery Jinx, Sphere of Protection, and can annihilate stronger enemies with her hidden techniques.

Select the companion to summon in your item bar and summon them with Use Inventory!

name: Doom II: Companions Pack by NB001
description:
Five Companions adds in your Game, By NB001 and rights to the original creators where these companions were used.

Well in a free time I had, I gave myself to the idea because of a mod that was the one that gave me the idea of these 5 classmates and the mod I refer to ClusterFuck, in doing mini addons of these classmates which will follow you throughout adventure that you do as well turn you into the biggest company.

Each partner deals damage and a different way of attacking, as in turn they are basically indestructible unless the player uses the command to kill these comrades. Which would make him a monster for killing his own friend.

name: Doom II: Deltarune Companions - Susie and Ralsei
description:
These companion characters come from Deltaruneland and they're
here to aid you in slaying demons or just to accompany you along
in whatever journey you might take!

name: Doom II: 'D'-Radys Companion Mod
description:
Yep, there' eight of them to choose from. You start with the summon items for each of the eight companions. Summon selectively, or summon them all!

You can move through them. They have a decent but not huge health pool, and If they die, they will take thirty seconds to respawn. They will silently teleport behind you if you leave their line of sight, so they'll always be hanging out around you.

name: Doom II: Onna Shinkan Companion
description:
Onna is always by your side in the adventure with fighting the demonic forces with you! ... Your adventure will not be alone while Onna Shinkan helps you and gives you company in your fight against the forces of hell!

Onna is equipped with an MK2 shotgun that the DOOM Slayer leaves him to defend himself against the enemies, after seeing that his baton is useless with these new enemies, it's time for Onna to take out his courage !.

name: DoomGals
description: DoomGals is a helper mod for classic Doom that allows you to summon up to four demon girls at any time to rip and tear by your side! Each girl has her own set of attacks and unique abilities that grant the player powerups, so choose which one you think would be best to help you finish a level...or summon all four for maximum carnage if you're up against a slaughtermap and need all the help you can get!

name: Doom II: Compendium
description:
After a long wait and an exorbitant amount of work I am pleased to finally be able to release my latest project: Compendium.

Having worked on this for a few years now, I feel confident in releasing v1.0. Compendium is as the name implies a compilation-style project, containing a hand picked collection of some of the best doom maps/wads released from 1994 to roughly 2004-2005, representing the classic era of Doom modding. All the mappacks represented have been remastered (in the sense that outdated DeHackED code has been converted to DECORATE/ACS) and bugfixed (generally speaking I've removed all bugs I've found which can allow a player to become stuck in a level, including a ton of fixes that should ensure much better multiplayer compatibility), but they are otherwise untouched, as it is not my intention to mess with the authors' original vision. This means that there are no new rooms, no different thing placements and nothing of the sort to be found in this. Each of the wads included in this is accessible from a (currently functional but unfinished) central hub map. After you complete one of the mappacks, you are sent back to the hub map, which means you can keep your arsenal when going to the next one (or simply start a new game to be taken back to the same hub map with a clear arsenal).

There are right now 54 wads represented, for a total of over one thousand levels. I've tried to ensure that this project is fully compatible with gameplay mods, and hopefully that is indeed the case: this includes the wads that previously broke horribly due to dehacked patches. Please note however that as of the current release there are no new weapons included. Some of the wads included in this are well known vanilla megawads from the time, such as Memento Mori, Obituary and STRAIN. Others are wads that take advantage of ZDoom features, such as Daedalus and Project Slipgate. Others yet take Doom gameplay to creative new heights, like Cyberdreams or All Hell is Breaking Loose. Some are celebrated classics, others are undiscovered gems. Some, like Eternal Doom, have absolutely massive maps which will take a long time to navigate, others, like Scythe, focus on quick and intense gun and run action. I've tried to go for as much variety as I could in terms of the styles of gameplay and level design offered here, so I am sure that you are bound to find at least one mappack you'd really like in this.

Some might wonder what the point of such a project is. One could, after all, simply download the relevant wads off the idgames database as needed. And indeed, my aim here is not that of replacing the original files, which should be preserved and rejoiced in exactly the way they used to be. As far as I'm aware there have not been similar projects to this released yet, although other communities such as the Duke Nukem 3D one have made something comparable. That being said, the advantages of having a project like this are numerous. For one thing all the 54 wads included here are completely cross-compatible which means you don't have to load each of them separately. This is particularly advantageous for those who wish to play using RPG-style mods with a very large arsenal and experience systems, etc (DoomRL comes to mind for example). It is also extremely useful for multiplayer hosting on Zandronum, as instead of hosting 54 servers you would need to host only one. Now not only that but as I mentioned, the code conversion and bugfixing makes these the most up to date and polished repackagings that these wads have seen yet. Some of these were still stuck in old DOS installers and such, personally I think it's about time someone made a modern repackaging to be enjoyed by all GZDoom users without hassle. Last but not least, I have spent a very long time digging the idgames archives (among other sites) to find interesting old wads that have slipped past the spotlights, so this project beyond being one of bugfixing and ease of use, is also (at least as far as I'm concerned) one of documentation. This is a love letter to that period of Doom modding which in my opinion holds some of the best maps ever made for the game, from which I think mappers even today could have a lot to learn.

name: Doom II: The Sentinel's Lexicon
description:
This project is intended to be a megawad complation that will contain some of the most pouplar and fun mapsets. This will also contain short mapsets also.

It will also contain a hub map where players can vote on the mapset to play on.

name: Doom Fighters
description: This is the new gameplay never seen in the classic Doom. A beat em up in Doom made with Completly 3D player model with cool animations fight the monsters in many ways, adding an exclusive experience for doom players that will taste the best of the gameplays in the doom modding community.

name: Zday Survival Simulator
description: Can you survive a zombie apocalypse? How will you know? ZDAY Survival Simulator was the world's first touch screen, text based RPG. Test your survival know how, and find out how prepared you really are.

name: DOOM Abort
description:
A sort of spiritual sequel to ouch_m, featuring dumb weapon ideas such as
defeating enemies through the power of headpats, or a button that crashes the
game when pressed.

name: Doom II: Ascension
description:
The Ascension is the direct heir of Inquisitor III. A modified RPG system, which was developed for the first time for The Inquisitor III, is used.
The world of Khorus needs a hero once more! You have been summoned to this world to fulfill your destiny. Only you can decide how the great prophecy will take its course. But, in order to deal with the fate of the world, you need to master powerful weapons and magic, and for that you will need to regularly increase your character attributes. Therefore, search for teachers all over the world — they will be willing to help you for a certain price.

name: Doom Tournament
description:
Doom Tournament is a gameplay mod for GZDoom created by Marisa Lago. Its development began in May of 2018 as a small test for supporting Unreal Engine 1 model files in GZDoom, growing into a full port of Unreal Tournament's arsenal once this was deemed a success. The first 1.0 release came out in October of 2019, and its latest released version is 1.1.3 (May 31st, 2021). Since November of 2021, the mod is no longer updated. [1]

Doom Tournament attempts to port the entire set of weapons from the classic Unreal Tournament, along with several of its items. Through the use of ZScript, much of the mod's functionality is almost identical to the original game, in many cases even code-wise, due to similarities between scripting languages.

name: Eriguns
description: Eriguns is a simple-ish weaponmoddy thing that takes ErianceAmuscaria's kickass Demon Eclipse weapon sprites and puts a xaseriffic code-y spin on 'em. it's basically just a thing i made once because i liked the sprites but then i released it and some other folks liked it too so das cool i guess

name: Hell Crusher
description: What is this mod? well it is heavily inspired by a mix of Doom Eternal and Doom16, plus a bit of the whole "overpoweredness" inspired by other gameplay mods.

name: The Inquisitor 3D
description:
"The Inquisitor III" is a full-fledged RPG based on GZDoom engine. There are no defined classes. You can develop your character in different directions, creating your own class as a result. You can get in the way of the warrior, battle mage, priest (i.e. mage, specializing mainly in defensive spells) or a combination of these ways in different proportions.
We have our own dialogue system for which you have to setup two additional buttons in the menu: one - to switch between anwers, the other - to use the selected one. These buttons are also used to select and cast defensive spells.
Compared with "The Inquisitor II", the set of weapons and monsters is significantly expanded. New spells and items in the inventory are also available.
There are 12 large maps combined into one hub.

name: IronTusk's Diablo3D
description: Finally a game that almost feels like the Diablo Series, Town Area's, Gheed (your Favorite merchant), You have skill systems, weapons, chests, useful items, hidden loot that can boost your stats, monsters from diablo 1 and 2, music from diablo 1 and 2, sound effects from diablo 1 and 2, Voices from Cain during intermissions, and map designs that are as close to the original games as possible. Its insane how much work went into this. Special thanks to Void Weaver, Aheretic, Ogden, Hoover1979, Thetis and others for contributing to this master piece. (A more expansive list of credits is in the game menu)

name: Brutal Unreal 99
description: Brutal Unreal 99 combines the Unreal Tournament 99 weapons ripped by the user Voltlock + the enemies of Brutal Doom Monsters, a mod for Doom I & Doom II.

name: High Sea Saga
description: High Sea Saga is a management sim by Kairosoft - command your own pirate ship and furrow ocean waters. Fight enemies, explore new land, and look for treasure.

name: Trinity Trigger
description: Trinity Trigger is an action role-playing video game developed by Three Rings and published by FuRyu in Japan. Published in Europe and Australia by Marvelous Europe and in North America by XSEED Games, Trinity Trigger features a star-studded group of RPG developers including worldbuilding artist Yuki Nobuteru (Secret of Mana), character designer Raita Kazama (Xenoblade), scenario writer Yura Kubota (OCTOPATH TRAVELER), and composer Hiroki Kikuta (Secret of Mana).

name: Legends of Heropolis
description: In Legends of Heropolis you manage a small town which is a secret base of super heroes. The heroes are residents in the town. They do farming, manufacturing products to sell while responding to distress calls from different areas where villains attack.

name: Freedom Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Smashing Star
description: Smashing Star is a 1v1 Catapult Battle game. Players drag characters to catapult and hit enemies while graffitiing the battleground. The player who gets more graffiti done wins the game.

name: Toumayhem
description: Toumayhem is a sci-fi/mystery visual novel set in Shigo Private High School, in Hokkaido; Yuki, a timid first-year, gets roped into a fight to overthrow the school's social system, and mixed up in a series of murders.

name: Super Mega Baseball 4
description: Super Mega Baseball 4 is where the Legends play. The signature combo of arcade-inspired style and immersive gameplay returns with over 200 baseball Legends and a grand slam of presentation upgrades.

name: Rocket League: Chaos Run
description:
Soccer meets driving once again in the long-awaited, physics-based multiplayer-focused sequel to Supersonic Acrobatic Rocket-Powered Battle-Cars!

This add-on includes... Two new Battle-Cars, Ripper and Grog, six unique Decals for each new Battle-Car (12 total), two new Paint Types, two new Wheels, two new Rocket boosts, three new Toppers and three new Antennas

name: Let Bions be Bygones
description: Having lost everything, a retired, hardboiled detective John Cooper, must take his last case in finding a missing upper-class girl among the lowest parts of the dystopian city-planet, Terrahive. Choose your unique path in this atmospheric narrative future-noir thriller.

name: CrossOver: Roll For Initiative
description: Defend your tabletop RPG paper character sheet from invading pixel enemies! Find matches in your tray of dice to power attacks to clear the evil from your shelf full of campaign books. Hardcore match-3 RPG puzzle meets action-strategy tower defence. Far from a casual game!

name: Drop: System Breach
description: Welcome to Drop, a fast-paced action-strategy hacking simulator. Ready to hack your way to fame and fortune while avoiding getting caught? Use stealth and cunning to maneuver between the ongoing power struggle of corporations and factions to control the fragmented networks in the city.

name: Eldrum: Untold
description: Eldrum: Untold (Previously Untold RPG) is an immersive text-based RPG adventure, combining old school Choose Your Own Adventure features with modern twists.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva Mega Mix+
description: Take center stage in Hatsune Miku’s premier rhythm game starring the world’s #1 virtual pop star herself. From a stunner setlist of songs to an enormous wardrobe to style, it’s the ultimate tour with Miku and friends—all it needs is you.

name: Leiria: Stargazer
description: A shoot-them-up heavily inspired by ESPGaluda

name: Arcade Master
description: The Arcade Master is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is a console built into an arcade stick, with a directional stick, six face buttons and 26 built-in Sega Mega Drive games. It has no cartridge slot, but can run games via SD cards.

name: Arcade Master Deluxe
description: The Arcade Master Deluxe is a console on a chip manufactured by AtGames. It is a console built into an arcade stick, with a directional stick, six face buttons and 26 built-in Sega Mega Drive games. It has no cartridge slot, but can run games via SD cards.

name: Arcade Nano Sonic
description: The Arcade Nano Series is a collection of RCA jack "Mega Drive-on-a-chip" units manufactured by AtGames. The console itself is built into a very small joystick that can be carried on a keychain or keyring using the strap attached to it. The entire console is powered by only one AAA battery (sometimes included), and it comes in an assortment of eight different variations, each with its own color scheme and game selection. Each package contains only the console (which doubles as the controller) and a mini-USB mono A/V output cable. Like many other newer clones, they are officially licensed by Sega.

name: Arcade Nano Virtua Fighter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Marshmallow
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Columns
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Altered Beast
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Sonic Blast
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Casino Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Nano Sonic 1 & 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingdom Legends: The Fallen Kings
description:
Kingdom Legends: The Fallen Kings is a roguelike experience that lets you take control of an adventurer king exploring a long forgone fortress after a disastrously multi nation invasion gone wrong.

The fortress is a mischievous place that many odd creatures call home now and it might never be recovered from the enemy's claws.

Discover what happened with the invasion reinforcements, get clues around the fortress and be careful with the enemies. Every run is different and lore items might not always spawn on every run.

Some random events might include extra lore content odds are a bit tricky sometimes. We hope you enjoy the multiple random events you can encounter.

name: Toraware no Kan
description: You woke up in the forest with amnesia. Without a cellphone, a hand bruise mark on your arm and a pack of medicine in your pocket, you search around for help. As you went into a mansion for help, a mystery man appeared before you and tell you to run away before it's too late...

name: Ookami Game Another
description: An alternate telling of the original Wolf Game story. This version introduces three new participants on top of all of the original participants and different murderers/story.

name: Steep: Winter Games - Gold Edition
description:
Steep Winter Games Edition includes Steep, the massive open world of the Alps and Alaska, where you master the world’s most epic mountainswith a snowboard, wingsuit, paraglider and skis. Steep - Road to the Olympics takes you on the journey to become an Olympic Winter Games champion

With Steep Road to the Olympics expansion, freely explore a massive open world, including iconic Japanese mountains, and train to qualify for Olympic Winter Games PyeongChang 2018 in South Korea.

name: Brain Games Colour
description: The Brain Games Colour, is an officially licensed handheld console released by AtGames. It contains 17 Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear games, and three "bonus" games.

name: Murdergram
description: Sin descripción

name: Handheld Electronic Games
