description: The Handheld Electronic Games by Coleco, also known as the Portable Player by PlayPal and Pocket Gear by Mediatronic, a handheld device containing 20 Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear titles.

name: Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle
description: Based in the world of Tyanaphos, Nexus: The Zoraidian Oracle is a strategic solitaire card game inspired by Hanafuda (a traditional Japanese flower card game similar to mahjong or rummy), steeped in original Western fantasy and Tarot-like themes. Featuring a 144-card deck comprised of minor and major arcana and additional categories unique to Tyanaphos, as well as a customizable user interface, Nexus is next-level solitaire. Gameplay can be relaxing or challenging to your critical thinking skills depending on your approach. The rules expand on familiar solitaire mechanics, rewarding more creative set-building strategies with point rewards and achievements.

name: Reactor
description: The Reactor, is an officially licensed Sega Mega Drive console released by AtGames. It contains 20 Sega Mega Drive games and a further 30 "bonus" games.

name: Micro Drive Festa
description: The Micro Drive Festa is a portable Sega Mega Drive clone console from Micro Drive brand manufactured by Cyber Toy for Russian markets.

name: Arcade Gamer Portable
description:
The Arcade Gamer Portable, also known as the AtGames Gear, is a Sega Master System and Sega Game Gear console on a chip. It was manufactured by AtGames, though has been distributed across the world by various companies, including Blaze Europe as the BlazeGear, and Tectoy as the Master System Portátil.

The console contains 30 built-in Sega Game Gear and Master System games and allows extra games to be played via the SD card slot. It uses emulation software to run the games, and does not have a traditional cartridge slot. It can also be connected to a television to play the games on a large screen instead of the built-in LCD screen, however it will only output a PAL signal.

name: Coby Portable DVD Player
description: The TF-DVD560 is a portable DVD player released in 2006, manufactured by Coby with 12 built-in Sega Game Gear and Master System games. It has a 3.5 inch TFT screen and runs off an AC adapter, car adapter or lithium ion battery. The games are emulated using console-on-a-chip hardware licensed from AtGames.

name: Pokémon Inclement Emerald
description:
Pokémon Inclement Emerald is a romhack of Pokémon Emerald.
Inclement Emerald is started out as a binary hack back in 2018, and has since been redone from scratch using the pokeemerald decompilation project. It's intended to offer a modern, more challenging take on the Hoenn region, and is full of quality-of-life improvements, new systems that streamline Pokémon training, and extra events.

name: Muga
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Beacon Brigade
description:
Reconnect the galaxy Galactic Beacon Brigade is a free action video game wherein you have to reconnect the galaxy. Developed by TomSmizzle, this physics-based indie game has simple controls and an even-simpler objective. However, this makes it a really short experience as it doesn’t have any fail conditions, so you’re bound to get things right even if your movements are wonky. This game can feel incomplete due to its short length.

Galactic Beacon Brigade has a simple premise: reconnect the galaxy with your mouse cursor-looking spaceship. To do this, you have to fly the ship between the two pulsing points on the screen by using either the W, A, and D keys or the arrow keys to steer the ship. However, space doesn’t allow for precise turning, so expect your ship to float past and start hitting the sides of the screen like a pinball.by activating the beacons!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Editable ROM EYX
description:
"You are searching for Sonic stuff throughout the internet, until you come across an unnamed ROM Hack with no info about it whatsoever. Is it just an abandoned buggy ROM Hack or is there something more into it?"

Welcome to Sonic the Hedgehog: Editable ROM, a game based upon a mysterious ROM Hack published into the internet.

name: Fallen Star
description: As the Cannan Empire reaches its way across the islands, conquering territories under the firm hand of the Emperor and a Mysterious Knight named Valles, the Imperial Prince Claude journeys with a girl named Hellen after he witnesses her village massacred by the very people he calls home. Along with a Mercenary and a mysterious Wizard from the Order of Ragnard, Claude and his friends enter the sacred monument of Obelisk seeking the Fallen Star, said to have fell at the top of Obelisk when Ragnard first walked the island, before it falls into the hands of Valles.

name: Mire
description: Mire is a difficult game where you play as a fly and fight giant predators, navigate the caves, swamp, and treetops to bring peace to the mire.

name: Cataphract OI
description:
With hours left before the confirmation of a new temporal cycle, a band of ambitious sellswords descends into the depths to bring the march of time to a final stop.

Time is running out, all over again...

Cataphract OI is an experimental turn-based RPG escort mission made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: LanVodis
description: LanVodis is an experimental treasure-hunting and overworld navigation game made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: Relics
description: Relics is an action-adventure game where players take the role of a spirit who can possess different characters. The spirit appears at underwater ruins with no explanation why it became a spirit and what it needs to do. In fact, one will only find out about the story of the game when seeing the real ending. The graphic style of the game is compared to the works of H. R. Giger.

name: Kimi ni Todoke: Tsutaeru Kimochi
description: A sequel to the first Kimi ni Todoke game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Gaia Odyssey
description: Gaia Odyssey is a 3D action RPG that gives you a mission to save an entire kingdom.

name: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3
description: Sega Archives from USA Vol. 3 is a compilation of seven Mega Drive games, emulated for the PC in Japan. It has the same games as Sega Smash Pack 2 except Sega Swirl. It marks the first time Vectorman 2 was released in Japan (and possibly outside the US in general).

name: Sega Mega Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Kimi ni Todoke Special
description: A bundle of both Kimi ni Todoke games.

name: Haldor
description: Haldor - game about the same name character. Plunge into the exciting soul-like rpg. Try your hand at becoming the revenge of the ancient Scandinavian warrior.

name: Roses Will Rise
description:
A tyrant's campaign has torn the kingdoms within Shanur apart. Firalda, a blacksmith's apprentice, seeks revenge for her father's death with the help of a plague doctor, a saint princess and a witch, raising hell within the castle they are imprisoned in.

Storm the castle with only four units in a strategy RPG with visual novel elements.

name: Touhou Rock Maiden: Houraisan Kaguya no Yabou!?
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: Oktoberfest Run
description: Oktoberfest Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your jolly run at the Oktoberfest festival.

name: Fantasy Zone II: The Tears of Opa-Opa
description:
Fantasy Zone II DX: The Tears of Opa-Opa is a special Fantasy Zone game first seen in the Sega Ages 2500 series entry, Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 33: Fantasy Zone Complete Collection. It is a remake of Fantasy Zone II: The Tears of Opa-Opa running on emulated Sega System 16 arcade hardware. As of MAME version 0.146u2, the game is currently available to play in an emulator.

Fantasy Zone II DX was re-released with additional features in 2014 in Japan and 2015 worldwide as 3D Fantasy Zone II W on the Nintendo 3DS.

name: Pitapat-Beat
description: Mobile rhythm game in the "Technic Beat" series. Features free and paid content.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: The Fantasy Zone port for Family Computer was developed by Sunsoft.

name: Fantasy Zone Neo Classic
description: A remaster of the NES port of Fantasy Zone. It was released first in the Sega Ages 2500 Series Vol. 33: Fantasy Zone Complete Collection.

name: Fantasy Zone: Boss no Gyakushuu
description: Fantasy Zone: Boss no Gyakushuu is a mobile phone game released for i-mode 503i devices through the Sonic Cafe portal. It is a boss rush game, where Opa-Opa battles the bosses from the original Fantasy Zone.

name: Fantasy Zone P1
description: Fantasy Zone P1 is a mobile phone game released for J-Sky (50KB) and EZweb (Java Phase 2/2.5) devices through the Sega Ages portal.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: The mobile version of Fantasy Zone is a release of the arcade game Fantasy Zone adapted to J2ME-compatible mobile devices.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: A port of Fantasy Zone for the NES by Tengen. It was released as an unlicensed game.

name: Fantasy Zone
description: The Master System port of Fantasy Zone differs visually from the original arcade Sega System 16 version, since the hardware is much more limited.

name: Project M EX Remix
description: Project M EX Remix is a game mod of Super Smash Bros. Brawl in the vein of the original Project M, building on each of its characters while adding many veterans from Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS and Wii U and Super Smash Bros. Ultimate along with many, many new faces. In what can basically be considered the culmination of the Brawl modding scene over 12 years, PMEX REMIX features a whopping 116 fighters - that's 27 more than Ultimate's final count of 89 at the end of its DLC development in October 2021 - from across Nintendo's franchises and beyond, all while incorporating the in-depth competitive mechanics of Super Smash Bros. Melee. In short? It's the ultimate Super Smash Bros. jam session, bringing together the best character, stage and music mods from across the community into one enormous package. If Smash as a whole is the definitive Massive Multiplayer Crossover of video game history, REMIX is the definitive Massive Multiplayer Crossover of Brawl mods.

name: Highpoint
description: Grab your friends and hit the court in HIGHPOINT - a competitive multiplayer game mixing energetic sports scoring with the physicality of a brawler! Build your own Bot baller in a world of endless summer vibes and lighthearted competition!

name: Naval Campaigns Kriegsmarine
description:
In May, 1941 the German Battleship Bismarck sailed into the North Atlantic to challenge the British control of the seas, and threaten her vital convoy routes. That journey would be the stuff of legends, as the Bismarck would blow up the HMS Hood off Iceland, before being run down while making a break for France. However, that was only a small part of the bitter battles fought between the Kriegsmarine and the Royal Navy during the war.

The war between Germany and Great Britain would not only be marked with the thunder of battleship guns, but the explosion of torpedoes launched from Schnellboot against coastal traffic in the English Channel.

In Kriegsmarine you can control the German fleet in actions like the Battle of Denmark Strait, North Cape, or Narvik. You can raid Allied shipping in the Atlantic, North Sea and Baltic while they try to hunt you down and stop you. You can also control the Allied navies leading the hunt to send the Kriegsmarine to the bottom of the ocean floor. The choice is up to you!

name: Mitsume ga Tooru
description: Based on a manga and anime of the same name. You control Hosuke Sharaku - a boy with a third eye on his forehead and of terrifying power. This power is unleashed when his third eye is open so he is wearing a bandage to seal his power and remove any memories of his true nature.

name: Conexus
description: Touch the shapes to connect them and make closed cycles. Make it fast! Two game modes make for a challenging experience. Are you up to it?

name: Ditch Whit #1: Shield Night
description:
Welcome to this first installment of Ditch Whit, which is running Shield's executive office OS, hosted on a server in the Good Hope mansion.

A browser game containing additional lore and context for players who have completed NORCO.

name: 3D Turbo OutRun
description: A 3D Classics port of Turbo OutRun only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: 3D Thunder Force III
description: A 3D Classics port of Thunder Force III only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: 3D Alien Syndrome
description: A 3D Classics port of Alien Syndrome only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: 3D Columns
description: A 3D Classics port of Columns only released inside the Sega 3D Fukkoku Archives 3: Final Stage compilation.

name: R/C Sports: Copter Challenge
description: Compete in adventure, events and puzzle so 4 modes of gameplay with 20-30 hours of content Skill of flying an RC heli coupled with co-ordination Adventure: Complete a course with obstacles and challenges within time constraints. License: Compete in events such as catch, hover, spoon race and more. Free flight: Practice techniques, tricks and manoeuvres on 5 unique levels. Also record your flight and save movies. Challenge: Once the levels are cleared in Adventure, you may fly them again in either “Time Attack” or Point Attack” settings. Buy new aircrafts or simply new parts for your helicopter in the maintenance mode, with the points that you’ve earned in the other modes. You will be taken to several environments such as forests and mountainous areas, a medieval castle or an urban environment 9 different realistic and licensed aircraft are available. These ascend through different levels of power and manoeuvrability, and can be upgraded with new engines and other parts for even more performance.

name: Quake: January Jump Jam 2
description:
January Jump Jam 2 is a map jam-pack made of 15 acrobatic maps, built with the base-themed Alkaline mod kit (included in the download) which adds a "jump boots" powerup for mid-air jumps.

Some of the maps are quite difficult. Expect floating platforms, bottomless pits, and void maps.

Includes start map, built-in difficulty select, custom soundtrack, and map source.

name: Quake: Realms of Tiddles
description:
Seven classic maps made in 1998-2001 by Peter Bisseker, also known as Tiddles. A variety of themes (base, rogue brick, wizmet) in an early yet distinct style.

All levels were released separately, but were intended to lead into each other. This release is a modern repackaging by historical map appreciator Greenwood, curating all of Tiddles' single player maps together into a convenient episode.

name: Quake: January Jump Jam
description: Ten large community maps of varying themes that add and are focused on double/triple-jump abilities.

name: Quake: Autumn Haunting
description:
Your battle after Carved In Flesh continues in this sequel. A contrasting dark medieval castle full of unfamiliar foe."
A mountain castle/church with boss battle using DKTe3 textures with around ten new or modified monsters and three new weapons.

name: Quake: Death's Dominion
description: Single player campaign with two episodes, each consisting of five medium-sized maps in varying themes, created by Alex "MonkeyDonut" Gingell, Ben "Hierarchy" Shribman, Rich "Xtermin8" Lawson, Dan "Infliction" Haigh. OK.

name: Lucid Dream
description: Lucid Dream is Point and Click horror game. The girl dream of being trapped in a weird place even though you fell asleep as always. Collect the item and Find clues! Escape and wake up from the dream!

name: Touhou Rock Maiden 2: Houraisan Kaguya no Nazo
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: Tools Up! Garden Party: Season Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Rock Maiden FC
description: A Touhou Doujin game based on Rockman (Megaman), developed by Capricorn.

name: Projector
description: Projector is an English Yume Nikki fangame. It's a traditional fangame with a focus on exploration and effect collecting. You play as a rabbit named Yisme.

name: From the Bottom of the Heart
description: Negaeba Kitto tells the story of a young man who has recently been treated for a serious illness, and who finds a certain kind of redemption in the most unlikely place.

name: Altered Beast
description: The Sega Genesis/Mega Drive has different enemy layouts and input mechanics from the original arcade version.

name: Altered Beast
description: The Sega Master System port of Altered Beast. It has heavily modified visuals due to technology capabilities.

name: Senna Oaks Spaceship Trip
description: Fly Senna Oak's damaged spaceship while the controls are gradually failing!

name: Sightline
description: A geometric puzzle game.

name: Skuiggle
description: Skuiggle is a small game about creating abstract paintings via a combination of strange controls and the collection of colourful boxes.

name: Virtually Board Snowboarding 2
description: Virtually Board Snowboarding 2 is a cancelled snowboarding for the N-Gage.

name: PatchCon! Defend the Library
description: This game is real-time strategy game where the player must choose 5 Touhou characters to create an army from and defend Patchouli's library from swarms of oncoming attackers that are after the books.

name: Shoot Shoot Nitori the Golden
description:
Collect equipment items that appear from enemies and item boxes to make Nitori more and more powerful.
Defeat enemies and become even stronger.

name: Mystical Chain
description: Mystical Chain is a Touhou Project fangame produced by LION HEART.

name: Akatsuki no Goei
description: The Eroge Akatsuki no Goei is the first of the trilogy in the series of the same name. The game follows Asagari Kaito as he becomes a bodyguard to the stuck up Nikaidou Reika.

name: Akatsuki no Goei: Principal-tachi no Kyuujitsu
description: This is a fan disc of Akatsuki no Goei, featuring six short stories. The game includes a Reika & Kyouka story, Tsuki story, Aya story, Moe story, Tae story, and an Anzu story focusing on Kaito's past that is unlocked after the previous five are completed.

name: Akatsuki no Goei: Tsumibukaki Shuumatsuron
description:
The final game in the Akatsuki no Goei Trilogy.

With helicopters in the air and thousands of police surrounding the ‘forbidden area’, where those who aren’t recognized as humans reside, the normal lives of Kaito and his friends are coming to an end.

name: Akatsuki no Goei Trinity
description: This game is a complete collection of the Akatsuki no Goei trilogy which follows Asagari Kaito as he becomes a bodyguard to the stuck up Nikaidou Reika. The games deal with themes of social and financial inequality. The trinity version has an upgraded 720HD scaling to all of the images, as well as extra CGs, extra openings for both Game 1 and Game 3, a nice and neat interface, and the option to check out the OST of the game.

name: Akatsuki no Goei Trinity: Complete Edition
description: This game is a complete collection of the Akatsuki no Goei trilogy which follows Asagari Kaito as he becomes a bodyguard to the stuck up Nikaidou Reika. The games deal with themes of social and financial inequality. The trinity version has an upgraded 720HD scaling to all of the images, as well as extra CGs, extra openings for both Game 1 and Game 3, a nice and neat interface, and the option to check out the OST of the game. The complete edition includes the 18+ scenes removed from the console releases of the trilogy.

name: Wuthering Waves
description:
Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG. You wake from your slumber as Rover, joined by a vibrant cast of Resonators on a journey to reclaim your lost memories and surmount the Lament.

The game features fast-paced combat with a variety of mechanics such as Extreme Evasion and Dodge Counter. You can also absorb the remaining of the monsters you've defeated and use their power in battles.

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible
description: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Shinyaku Last Bible New Testament is a spin off Megami Tensei title for Legacy Mobile devices.

name: Space Escape Obstacles
description: Try to avoid the obstacles and conquer all the levels/worlds.

name: Take a Seat!
description: Try and find a seat on the bus by talking to other passengers, helping people out, or just plain getting swindled.

name: Life and Minimalism
description:
What can we eliminate from our life to make it better?

A game made for Ludum Dare 26 on the theme of "Minimalism".

name: That Smiling Game
description:
What can we eliminate from our life to make it better?

A short point-and-click game.

name: Digimon Super Rumble
description: Digimon Franchise, Turn Based, MMORPG

name: Dead Rising 4: Capcom Heroes
description: Capcom Heroes allows players to dress up like characters from other Capcom video games. Each character has their own unique set of abilities or weapons.

name: Sonic 3D Blast
description: The Saturn version of Sonic 3D Blast has enhanced visuals and a new style of bonus stages.

name: Sonic 3D Blast
description: The PC port of Sonic 3D Blast adds yet another style of bonus games.

name: The Gannet
description: An island creation myth featuring divinity and a sea bird.

name: The Quest for One
description: Become the greatest common divisor, reap the greatest dividends.

name: Luna Child no Saishuu Bouei Line 3
description: A doujin game by Enamel Sword based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary - Collectors Edition
description:
Tomb Raider: Anniversary is a remake of the original Tomb Raider with a technically more advanced graphics engine. It has the same basic storyline, though some cutscenes and much of the dialogue within have been expanded or modified in other ways.

Two disc collectors edition - Bonus materials include :
- The Tomb Raider Story: A Ten Year Retrospective Documentary
- Tomb Raider: Anniversary and Tomb Raider: Legend Exclusive Soundtrack mix
- gallery of Tomb Raider artwork and collection of trailers from the past and present

name: Tendo Blade
description: Tendou Blade is an RPG featuring Tenshi Hinanawi.

name: The Griffon Legend
description: The Griffon Legend is a freeware zelda-like RPG created in FreeBASIC as part of a contest by Syn9 (Daniel Kennedy). 500 years after the Griffon-Dragon war, the Dragons have returned to reclaim their empire. Cities are falling, everyone is dying, and the lone Griffon Knight Fayne is caught up in the middle of it all.

name: Magenta Arcade
description:
The cycle of wishes is a sacred ritual for the people! It is where you give out wishes for them. During many cycles peace reigned in your lands, but everything changed when Ivo Magenta made his last wish. Now, disaster emerges, and you have to sleep until the next cycle. When you wake up, everything depends on you!

Use your finger to shoot him and his minions down with weaponized wishes, the world's order is now in your hands! Literally! Magenta Arcade is a finger-based top-down shooter. In other words, it is a top-down 2D shooter where your "ship" is your finger. Know when to touch the screen to attack or retract and hide to defend yourself!

name: Cangaço
description:
What about praying for protection? Or slanging to curse your enemies? In Cangaço, an RTT with RPG elements, featuring 3 single-player campaigns, online multiplayer, and custom maps, faith will make all the difference.

Choose a hero and take control of your group in a story full of bloody battles between Cangaceiros (outlaws) and Volantes (the police) in the convoluted backlands in the late 19th century. Pick your side, equip your group and eliminate all menaces with weapons, power-ups, and sacred amulets.

Surviving in Cangaço is no easy task! To overcome the challenges, you'll need to plan the best combat strategy and manage the best combination of skills, attributes and equipment, besides collecting supplies such as water, liquor, sugar-cane bars, etc...

name: The Legend of Zelda: Oni Link Begins
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Zelda: Time to Triumph
description: Sin descripción

name: The Sky Left Us
description: The Sky Left Us is a sci-fi visual novel about climate crisis, classism, and how relationships shape our politics. Play as Spire Risan, an off-worlder scientist who becomes entangled in the drama of a mountain they came here to save. Fall in with the denizens of the three castes, and find that things are more complicated than they seem: be it love, family, or the systems that shape us.

name: Kami-sama Nante Yondenai!
description: Kami-sama Nante Yondenai! is a PC otome game released by Kalmia8 in 2017.

name: Toro
description:
TORO is a music toy about an orange matador and a blue bull.

Lead the bull to the pins but don't let it collide with the boundaries or matador.

name: Love Signal: D-Mate
description: A story of an Android Girl who's learning new emotions. Who will be her true love?

name: Trainsmission
description: There's been a murder on the train, capture the criminal but make sure not to accuse an innocent person!

name: Traveler
description: Traveler is a short work of interactive fiction about identity, existence, purpose, and loss. It features four endings and infinite procedurally-generated planets.

name: Unto the Night
description:
Gamma, Delta, and Epsilon have seen more than enough to last a life time. They've been given hardly any information on what they are supposed to investigate and are also bringing some fresh recruits along.

A sci-fi narrative game made in Twine.

name: Wanderzone
description: Jam to a chaotic tune and get lost in bizarre terrain.

name: Hana Yori Dango: F4 to First Kiss
description: Hana Yori Dango: F4 to First Kiss is a mobile game based off the anime Hana Yori Dango/ Boys Over Flowers.

name: Who Let the Critters Out?!
description: You're a small bat visiting the beach with all your friends. Your pal Bingo asked if you can help pass out watermelon slices to everyone but there are obstacles and enemies blocking you!

name: On the Q.T.
description: On the Q.T. is a mobile otome game released in 2018.

name: Witches and Stitches
description: A 7k word Twine game about working retail and dealing with magic managers who hate each other. So, a normal shift.

name: Within the Walls
description: You're lost in a dark and strange place that defies logic, what makes it worse is that you're followed and preyed upon by unknown forces. Find your way through the catacombs of this horror text adventure as you struggle to survive with your life and your sanity intact.

name: You Understand Kawaii
description: Communicate with strangers' dogs.

name: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki
description: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki is a otome game for PlayStation 2.

name: Escape from the Haunted House
description: As a nephew of the genius mechanic, Sir Edward, you have been trapped in his house. Now you are a prisoner with only time on your side. Try your skills to solve all the puzzles, and escape from the haunted house!

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 1: The Mahjong
description: This is a video game version of the ancient game of Mahjong for the PlayStation. The player can go up against up to three computer opponents. It is a budget title released only in Japan, and was the first release in the Simple 1500 Series.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 4: The Reversi
description: Reversi (also marketed by Pressman under the trade name Othello) is a board game involving abstract strategy and played by two players on a board with 8 rows and 8 columns and a set of distinct pieces for each side. Pieces typically are disks with a light and a dark face, each side belonging to one player. The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible.

name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.9 - The Chess
description:
Simple 1500 Series: Vol.9 - The Chess is a chess game that features a single mode, a 2 players vs mode & a tutorial explaining the rules of chess.

Chess is a two-player board game played on a chessboard, a square-checkered board with 64 squares arranged in an eight-by-eight grid. Each player begins the game with sixteen pieces: One king, one queen, two rooks, two knights, two bishops, and eight pawns. Pieces move in different assigned ways according to their type, and accordingly are used to attack and capture the opponent's pieces. The object of the game is to checkmate the opponent's king, whereby the king is under immediate attack (in "check") and there is no way to move or defend it.

name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.12 - The Quiz
description: The Quiz is a quiz game that features more than 15000 different questions of different subjects, the game features also a 2 player mode.

name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.15 - The Pachinko
description: With 3 types of original pachinko machines, this game delivers a real sense of playing inside a pachinko parlour. The 3 pachinko machines available are "CR Love Love Project 2", a LCD machine offering diversified reach actions, "CR Star Robot" with heated double and triple reach actions, and "Surfing Island", a colourful machine in the motif of aloha T-shirts.

name: Simple 1500 Series: Vol.16 - The Pachislot
description: Slot machine game released in 1999.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 19: The Sugoroku
description: Simple 1500 Series vol.019 The Suguroku is a board game based on the Sugoroku game, the game features different boards and can be played by up to 4 human players at the same time. Sugoroku is a game with which you can step one block by one from start to the end of various stories using a dice.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 20: The Puzzle
description:
Is a classic 2D puzzle game with a fantasy theme and cartoon graphics. The gameplay as usual in these kind of games is about putting the same kind of colour ball pieces together so they can be destroyed. When all the colour ball are destroyed the level is cleared.

The major difference is in how the balls are moved, the player controls a character that is on charge of somekind of cannonball that used to shot the different colour balls, the more the button is pressed the farther the ball will go.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 21: The Yakyuu - Pro Yakyuu Jitsumeiban
description: Simple 1500 Series Vol.21 - The Yakyuu - Pro Yakyuu Jitsumei-ban is a baseball simulation game featuring players detailed data, and the player can design the team tactics, trade players, etc. The game features also a 2 players vs mode using a save of a team in the main game.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 23: The Gateball
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 23 - The Gateball is a golf croquet game featuring different teams and also a tutorial explaining the rules of the game.

Set in a variety of courses such as gymnasium Park Stadium ground also changes how the ball rolling, try to choose a favorite team and participate in this unique 5 teams each with different characteristics. Us to explain the rules, classroom equipped with a gate ball mode, even beginners can easily enjoy.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 24: The Gun Shooting
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 24 - The Gun Shooting is a gun game set in the African continent in a near future in which the player (or players since the game features a 2 players cooperative mode) are 2 members of an organization with the mission of saving the continent from an alien army.

The game is divided in different stages that are plains, rivers, mountains, etc. And at the end of each level there is a leevl boss that the player has to defeat to advance to the next one.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 25: The Keiba
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 25 - The Keiba is a horse racing game in which the player can compete in differents tracks. The gameplay is really arcade since to gain speed the player has to press the X Button lots of time, but it also has to be careful not to tire so much his horse or the horse stamina will be over, and reduce to speed at the end of the race, so is better to be in the group and accelerate in the last part of the race to have some chances of win.

The game features also a 2 players mode in which 2 human players can compete in the same race to know which of them will arrive in a better place.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 27 - The Snowboard
description: Snowboarding consists of racing downhill and performing death-defying stunts. For speed fans, the Race Mode allows players to race against the clock or two computer-controlled opponents.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 28: The Dungeon RPG
description:
In Simple 1500 Series vol. 28 - The Dungeon RPG the player controls a warrior that goes to explore a labirynth and defeat all the monsters that comes his way. The game features more than 50 weapons and protective gears, the player can use a variety of items, there are a lot of different monsters and a level boss battle to pass to the next level.

During his way to player will face numerous traps during the dungeon. The game creates the map every time that a new game is started so it can be played a lot of times.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 29: The Tsuri
description:
Simple 1500 Series vol. 29 - The Tsuri is a first person perspective fishing game That features 5 different main fishing spots (with different part of each fishing spot for the player to choose where to fish) in places like rivers, ponds, etc.

The game is about fishing freshwater fishes, there are 2 games modes: Free mode and challenge mode. The free mode is just choose a spot and go to fish there. In the challenge mode the game challenge the player to catch a fish with a specific weight.

name: Biotronic
description:
Puzzle game features colorful biotechnology. Its highlights: easy mouse controls, exploding combos and beautiful animations.

Challenge yourself and your friends in this exciting game.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 32: The Boxing
description: Go for the championship, challenge a friend in exhibition mode or unlock characters in 1-on-1 bouts against the computer.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 33: The Takkyuu
description:
Simple 1500 Series vol.033 - The Takkyuu is a Ping Pong game features 2 characters (boy and a girl) and 2 main game modes:

- Story mode: Defeat all the opponents to complete the story
- Free mode: Choose an opponent to play against

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 34: The Quiz Bangumi
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 34: The Quiz Bangumi is a quiz game that features 4 different themes and 12 different characters for the player to choose. The game features more than 6000 different questions and can be player with up to 4 human players at the same time using the multitap device.

name: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki Portable
description: S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki Portable is a port of S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 36: The Renai Simulation - Natsu Iro Celebration
description:
The Renai Simulation: Natsu Iro Celebration is a classic adventure dating simulation game.

The game begins at the beginning of august when Kimi is a young student receive a call from her father telling her to return to home in 21 days. So she decided to enjoy those days having fun with her classmate friend. They will go around the town and meet different people.

Everytime that the game is played the personality of the people changed making each time a different experience for the player. The game features 11 different main characters to interact.

name: Plock
description: Discover the exciting world of Plock featuring colorful blocks and special items. Break the blocks by matching two or more of the same color, or by exploding the bombs earned during the match.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 37: The Illustration Puzzle & Slide Puzzle
description: Big collection of illustration and slide puzzles for the player to choose and solve. Up to 2 players to play at the same time. There are more than 500 illustration puzzles and more than 100 slide puzzles.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 38: The Real Racing - Toyota
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 38: The Real Racing - Toyota is a racing game that features different Toyotas car models that can be drive in different Japanese circuits and in different time (noon, evening, night, etc) and weather conditions (sunny, cloudy, rain or misty).

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 39: The Mahjong 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 39: The Mahjong 2 is a four players mahjong game in which the player can compete against three computer opponents to see if he can win the matchs. The game features also a quiz mode and a tutorial.

name: Project Household
description: Sin descripción

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 40: The Shogi 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 40: The Shogi 2 is a shogi game that some difficulty levels and a tutorial.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 41: The Reversi 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 41: Reversi 2 is a reversi game that features a character creation mode in which the player can customize his character appearence (hair, eyes, face, etc) and them compete against different computer opponents in a sort of story mode. The game also has a free mode.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 43: The Hanafuda 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 43: The Hanafuda 2 is the second hanafuda game in the Simple 1500 series and also features a character creation mode in which the player can customize his character appearence (hair, eyes, face, etc) and them compete against different computer opponents in a sort of story mode. The game also has a free mode.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 45: The Block Kuzushi 2
description:
Block Kuzushi 2 is a good breakout game that can be played by 2 players in cooperative or VS mode. The game is the sequel to Block Kuzushi (released as Block Buster in Europe) and this one wasn't released outside Japan.

The game offers some interesting special moves like the one in which you can hit the ball with effect pressing a button.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 46: The Mahjong Ochige - Raku Jongg
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 46: The Mahjong Ochige - Raku Jongg is mix between a mahjong (in the theme) and a tetris puzzle game. The gameplay is about using the pieces that falls from the ceiling to combine them using the mahjong rules to make them dissapear and attack the opponent.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 48: The Puzzle 2
description: Destructo 2 is a simple color-matching puzzle game similar to Mr. Driller, originally released as part of a budget series in Japan. The main objective is to guide a cartoon character moving through an ascending pile of multicolored tiles, pushing the available blocks to create clusters of the same color. Groups of four or more tiles of matching colors can be removed by punching one of the connected blocks, with the vacant space being occupied by the falling stacks on top. The descending tiles that end up rearranged in new color clusters are automatically eliminated and give combo points.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 49: The Casino
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 49: The Casino is a gambling game with some adventure elements, the game has a story mode in which the player is a man that arrives at a town and when he is in the airport he lost all his money but finds a coin of 50 and he decide to play in the casino to earn enough money to leave town. In the Casino he can play gambling games like Roulette, Card Slot, Card games, Horse racing bet, Tetris, etc

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 50: The Billiards 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 50: The Billiards 2 is the sequel to The Billiards and the game features a new opponent CPU that makes the game more difficult, there are also different game modes like Nine Ball, Eight Ball, Rotation, etc.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 51: The Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 51: The Jigsaw Puzzle features more than 200 different jigsaw puzzles, and the player can choose the difficulty level and there are different subjects and styles.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 54: The VolleyBall - Break Volley Plus
description: Break Volley is an indoor volleyball game with cartoon graphics. The game features male and female teams and 12 national teams. The game supports up to four players at once.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 55: The Darts
description: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 55: The Darts features a complete 3d simulation of the darts sport with game modes like 301, 501, cricket, etc. The game uses the analog stick for a more realistic simulation.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 57: The Maze
description: A 3d game similar to the classic Spy vs Spy series. You are inside a 3D virtual maze and have to compete against another human player or the computer to find the treasures, objects and keys before your oponent does. To do this you can use your weapon or phisical attacks against the oponent to stealth his treasures.

name: Pigs on Head
description:
Pigs on Head is a game made by Videlectrix.

In both modes of the game, the object is to catch the pigs on Pageboy's head and give them to either Hank or Frank. If Pageboy fails to catch a pig, it's destroyed and Pageboy loses a life. Lose all three, and the game is over. Pageboy can only carry 10 pigs on his head at one time.

In Mode A, you control all three characters at once.

In Mode B, Hank and Frank move up and down the ladders in a predetermined pattern (when Hank goes up, Frank goes down and vice-versa).

The number of points you earn for dropping off pigs is directly related to the number of rungs up Hank/Frank are on the ladder. Therefore, the bottom rung (or one pig on head) is worth 1 point, while the top rung is worth 10.

name: UFO: Trilogy
description: Sin descripción

name: The Settlers Complete I-VI
description: Sin descripción

name: Gothic: Complete Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Q-Cubed
description: Q-Cubed is a spatial-reasoning puzzle platformer. Navigate a 3D world while seeing and moving in two orthogonal perspectives.

name: S.Y.K: Renshouden
description: S.Y.K: Renshouden is a fan disc of S.Y.K: Shinsetsu Saiyuuki. You can enjoy sweeter love stories with target characters and past stories, which were previously untold.

name: S.Y.K: Renshouden Portable
description: S.Y.K: Renshouden Portable is a port of S.Y.K: Renshouden for PlayStation Portable.

name: Tour Party: Sotsugyou Ryokou ni Ikou
description:
Tour Party Sotsugyou Ryokou ni Ikou is a board game, that was released for Sega Saturn and PlayStation, in which the player can choose at the beginning of the game to play as a girl or a boy, the theme of the board is to travel, and the game features at the 4 human players to play as the same time and compete against the others.

The gameplay is similar to Takara's the Game of life but in Tour Party, during the journey the players will meet different people and they can become friends with them, and different events that will make the trip more interesting.

The game features 8 different characters to choose from and a complete viewer mode with character profiles, musics, and other unlockables modes.

name: 4D Miner
description: 4D Miner is a 4-dimensional survival sandbox game that allows players to explore an infinite, randomly-generated, 4-dimensional world.

name: Kojum
description: A football and martial arts mashup. Local multiplayer featuring 1v1 to 4v4 matches.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 60: The Table Hockey
description:
Simple 1500 Series vol. 60: The Table Hockey features up to 4 human players to play at the same time (using the multitap controller).

The game has 3 different modes:

- Normal Mode
- Item Mode
- Arrange Mode

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 61: The Quiz 2
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 61: The Quiz 2 is the second quiz game in the Simple 1500 series and also features more than 15000 different questions of different subjects, the game features also a 2 player mode.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 62: The Ski
description:
Simple 1500 Series vol. 62: The Ski is a Ski game that use the same graphic engine that the Snowboarding. The game features 3 main characters (that the player can change their clothes) and 3 game modes:

- Race Mode: Compete against yourself or 1 or 2 computer opponents and try to win the race.
- Trick Mode: Compete against yourself or 1 or 2 computer opponents and do the best trick score.
- Mix Mode: A mix between race & trick mode. You got to win the race and do as much tricks as you can.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 63: The Gun Shooting 2
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 63: The Gun Shooting 2 is a gun game that features 3 game modes:

- Story Mode: Can be played by 1 or 2 players at the same time, and features 30 stages.
- Score Attack Mode: Beat the score to win. Unlockable playing the story mode
- Party Mode: Up to 4 players can compete to know which one achieve the bigger score.

name: Naruto: Star Students - Ninja Survival
description: The Chunin exams are underway, and the Seven Team members await the next test. Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura must fight their way through the forest of death, in a fight against rival teams and dangerous animals.

name: Courage the Cowardly Dog: Pharaoh Phobia
description: Guide Courage the dog through the creepy crypts of the Egyptian Pyramid to rescue his family before they all become ancient history. Look out for power ups!

name: Rave Slaves
description: Destroy stereos to stop the music and take the rave dancers out of DJ Stylbator's spell.

name: Powerpuff Girls: Zom-B-Gone!
description: Shoot magic elements, watch out for magic bags and stop zombies by clicking on objects!

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 66: The Kaiten - Mawasun Da!!
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 66: The Kaiten - Mawasun Da!! is a collection of a lot of wacky mini games with a difficult control method since in most of the games the player has to turn quickly the left analog stick to gain speed and is really hard to do it.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 70: The War Simulation - Nin no Tsukurishisha-tachi
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 70: The War Simulation - Nin no Tsukurishisha-tachi is a Tactical RPG in which the player takes control of Ken (and his mecha robot) that is a member of a Rebellion Army that is trying to defeat the dictator government that is pressing the people.

name: Successor
description: Successor plays at a brisk pace combining fast phased action with strategical depth. To reach the king's castle, you must carve a path conquering some of its many regions. You explore the lands to become stronger and learn about your enemies whom you battle at small diorama boards together with a selection of your acquired heroes. Choose carefully between your battles, as you risk losing everything.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 71: The Renai Simulation 2
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 71: The Renai Simulation 2 is a classic adventure dating simulation game.

The player takes the role of a young student (19 years old) called Yahagi Shiyunpei that failed to enter university and start working as an assistant professor in a private school and he got the mission of trying to help 5 girls that study there to pass the exams, and to do that he will have to help them to study during the summer. During the summer he will also got the chance to date them and maybe fall in love with any of them.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 72: The Beach Volley
description:
Simple 1500 Series Vol. 72: The Beach Volley is a beach volley game that features up to 4 players to play at the same time. The game features these game modes:

- Exhibition
- Tournament
- League
- Training

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 73: The Invaders - Space Invaders 1500
description: The Invaders - Space Invaders 1500 features the originals arcade machines (with and without background artwork) and a new 3d mode, called Space Invaders 3D that features a new graphics 3d engine, a first person view and other camera angles and vibration function for all the modes modes.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 75: The Double Shooting - Raystorm & Raycrisis
description:
Simple 1500 Series vol. 75: The Double Shooting - Raystorm & Raycrisis is a compilation of 2 Taito arcade game shooters.

1 - RAYSTORM:
The year is 2219 and the Secilia Federation has initiated a plan to destroy Earth. So far, the evil federation has been highly successful in destroying much of the planet's defensive forces and resources. With world destruction at hand, the fate of mankind is looking for a savior.

2 - RAYCRISIS:
The sequel to RayStorm, RayCrisis: Series Termination takes place in a time when the future of mankind hangs in the balance. Determined to create the ultimate neural interface between man and machine, a rogue scientist named Leslie McGuire cloned herself and hardwired the clone's mind into directly into Con-Human, a powerful, worldwide computer network. Con-Human's AI quickly took over the clone's consciousness and was driven insane. Unable to comprehend the complexities of sentience and the human psyche, the Network went on a killing spree that wiped out most of Earth's 13 billion citizens.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 78: The Zero Yon
description: Simple 1500 Series vol. 78: The Zero Yon is a street racing game in which the player takes the role of a driver that wants to become the king of king in the street racing, and to do that he will have to compete against other drivers in the town and win the different races to get the best score and be the first one in the ranking. The player can also buy new parts for improve his car (like tires, engine, etc.).

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 79: The Shisenshou
description: The Shisenshou is a puzzle game similar to the Shanghai series since the player have to find 2 pieces of the same shape & colour that are alone to join them and make them dissappear, the player have to follow an order since he can make 2 pieces dissappear if they are surrounded by other different pieces, except when the 2 equal pieces are one next to the other. To advance to the next stage the player has to clear of the pieces in each stage before the time ends.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 80: The Jintori - Volfied 1500
description: The game is an updated version of Qix, with extra features and a futuristic science fiction aesthetic, rather than Qix's abstract geometry style. The player pilots a small spaceship instead of a simple dot and the enemies come in the form of various aliens.

name: Formula Bwoah
description: Formula Bwoah is a strategic arcade top down motorsport racing game where you not only drive the car, but also plan and react to dynamic racing events like changing weather, track conditions, tire degradation, etc.

name: Monique: Passion Hôtesse de Caisse
description:
Humorous and deliberately bad simulation of the daily life of a cashier.
Scan them all! Monique: Passion Hôtesse de Caisse is a unique simulation that puts you, shower in hand, in various situations where speed and dexterity are essential to satisfy the customer and your boss!

name: Yoiyami Densetsu: The Legend of Twilight
description: Yoiyami Densetsu: The Legend of Twilight is a fan-made Touhou Project 2D action-adventure game developed by Otter's Arcadia, featuring Rumia as the protagonist.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 82: The Sensuikan
description: The Sensuikan is a radio control submarine simulator that features a story mode in which the player takes the role of a young kid that buy a new radio control submarine and will have to pass several stages against other users to gain more money that will allow him to improve his submarine or buy new ones in the town shop.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 84: The Intro Quiz
description: The Intro Quiz is the third quiz game in the Simple 1500 series and also features more than 1000 different questions of different musical subjects, the game features also a 4 player mode in which 4 human players can compete between them.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 85: The Sengoku Bushou - Tenka Touitsu no Yabou
description: The Sengoku Bushou - Tenka Touitsu no Yabou is a strategy game that takes place in the Warring States period, the player can choose between 3 possible characters and three different time periords to start the conquer.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 86: The Onigokko
description: The Onigokko is based on the child game and features up to 4 human players to play at the same time, 10 different characters (male and female ones) to play with and a really complicated control system.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 87: The Kyoutei
description: The Kyoutei features different game modes (tournament, free race & 2 players vs), 2 main playable character to choose from at the beginning of the game (there are more unlockables), 7 different courses to compete in, and a 2 players vs mode in split screen.

name: Powerpuff Girls: Pillow Fight
description: The powerpuff Girls are gearing up for a power packed pillow fight! Choose either Blossom, Bubbles or Buttercup, then lead the way to feather-filled infantry!

name: Ben 10: Ben to the Rescue
description: The game features Tetrax Shard kidnapping Gwen, prompting Ben to chase after him to save her.

name: Dexter's Lab: Dee Dee's Moon Squad
description: To prevent anymore trouble, Dexter has transported Dee-Dee, Mee-Mee and Lee-Lee to the moon. The three girls are forced to use a moon buggy to find a rocket ship that will take them back home. The player must traverse the moon buggy across ten levels, avoiding pitfalls and battling aliens along the way. The buggy can jump, fire photon projectiles and launch tracking missiles.

name: Doctor Who: Duo Bundle
description: Come face to face with Weeping Angels, Cybermen, Daleks and more! Join the Thirteenth (Jodie Whittaker) and Tenth Doctor (David Tennant) on an epic adventure in space and time in Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality, and team up with Petronella Osgood to solve a chilling found-phone mystery in Doctor Who: The Lonely Assassins.

name: Tetris Classic
description: Tetris Classic for Windows is an enhanced version of the previously released game for DOS.

name: Them's Fightin' Herds: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes Them's Fightin' Herds (base game) and the Season 1 Pass.

name: Witch on the Holy Night: Limited Edition
description: Witch on the Holy Night: Limited Edition includes the game, a special illustrated box, and an artbook.

name: Magnet Face
description:
Billy has been kidnapped by aliens, so your task is to help him escape their prison and spaceship, without taking too much damage so that the aliens catch up to him and grab him back.

As you proceed to the end of each level, give it your best to collect as much cheese as possible, so that you amount to a really big score, and solve all the puzzles you encounter in order to advance, since the path is not that clear. Billy's face is magnetized, so he will be able to collect cheese easier.

name: Fairy Fencer F: Refrain Chord
description: A young man named Fang became a "Fencer" a warrior who handles the special weapon "Furies" imbued with the life force of fairies. Fang travels across the world collecting a Fury to revive the goddess.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Ed Over Heels
description: The Eds perform tricks to impress Nazz. There are three levels in the game. Each one has you controlling a different Ed, and as the game progresses the difficulty increases.

name: Pretty Girls Game Collection
description:
Pretty Girls Game Collection includes Pretty Girls Mahjong Solitaire, Delicious! Pretty Girls Mahjong Solitaire, Pretty Girls Panic! and Pretty Girls Klondike Solitaire on a single game card for Nintendo Switch or disc for PlayStation 4.

Meet 13 Pretty Girls across 50 stages! With each challenge you clear, commemorative photos will be added to your Gallery for casual viewing. Can you complete them all?

name: Yomawari: Lost in the Dark - Deluxe Edition
description: A young girl awakens in a dark, unfamiliar forest with no recollection of how she got there. As she searches for a way out, she crosses paths with a mysterious individual who reveals to her that she’s been cursed. In order to break the curse, she needs to explore the streets of her town at night to seek out her lost memories. However, malevolent ghosts lurk within the shadows, and the girl must avoid them by running, hiding, and shutting her eyes if she hopes to survive long enough to break her curse.

name: Ed, Edd n Eddy: Lunchroom Rumble
description: During lunchtime at the school, everyone declares a food fight. Whomever wins will become the ultimate food fight champion.

name: Nexomon + Nexomon Extinction: Complete Collection
description: Return once again to classic monster catching and experience the complete Nexomonstory with two epicadventures in one!

name: Mail Mole: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetris
description:
Tetris is the first Tetris game developed and released by Spectrum HoloByte, and the first version to be released commercially.

There are two versions of the game; the revised version has the plane on the title screen removed (at the request of Elorg) and the military-themed backgrounds replaced (at the request of Pajitnov). The revised version was also featured on Tetris Gold.

name: Tetris
description:
Mirrorsoft's Tetris version was the very first commercial release of Tetris in the world. It was also released for the following home computer platforms: Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Amstrad PCW, BBC Micro/Acorn Electron, MSX, Atari ST, and Amiga.

Along with the version developed by Mirrorsoft's American sister company, Spectrum HoloByte, it was originally released before Andromeda Software was able to get a licensing deal with Elorg. A contract between Andromeda Software (the sublicensing party), and Elorg was eventually signed on May 10, 1988, which secured the legality of the products.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris, developed by Bullet-Proof Software, was the first licensed Tetris game to be released commercially in Japan. It was released on most of the common home computers from the era.

name: Dead Wife Game
description: Sin descripción

name: When Stuffed Animals Attack!
description: Dee Dee has used Dexter's newest invention to bring her stuffed animals to life. Help Dexter return the animals to their normal state before his secret lab gets closed.

name: Tetris
description:
Tetris for Famicom is a port of the Japanese home computer version. Originally published under an incorrect licence, the game led to Henk Rogers's purchase of the Tetris licence on multiple platforms, which later led directly to further Nintendo releases.

It is infamous for its control scheme, which mapped down to rotate, and A to hard drop, the opposite of most later versions which have down for drop and A for rotate.

On October 1st, 2018 the game was re-released as part of the AtGames Legends Flashback. It has an updated copyright screen and remapped controls (up/B for rotate, down/A/C for hard drop). On November 1st, 2019, it was re-released on the updated Legends Flashback, Legends Ultimate Arcade, and the Adventure Flashback Blast!.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris For the Toshiba J-3100 series computers.

name: Tetris
description: Tetris is an arcade game published by Sega in 1988. It took Japanese arcades by storm, and is one of the most commonly known versions of the game. Due to its popularity, it became the base of rules for many other Japanese games created later on, both licensed and unlicensed. Such games include the TGM series, Tetris Plus series, Tetris S and Shimizu Tetris. It was one of the first games to have lock delay, greatly improving maneuverability at high speeds.

name: Runaway Robot
description: Dexter must find all pairs of glasses in this point-and-click game in order to activate his robot.

name: Vs. Tetris
description: Vs. Tetris is a game developed by Tengen for the Nintendo Vs. Unisystem arcade platform. The game would be the basis for Tetris (NES, Tengen) released some time later, and is noticeably less developed (e.g. the piece graphics use only solid colored or striped blocks).

name: Tetris
description: Tetris is a game for the Sharp Wizard or Electronic notebook in Japan.
